tapaḥsvādhyāyanirataṃ tapasvī vāgvidāṃ varam / nāradaṃ paripapraccha vālmīkir munipuṃgavam // 1.001.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān / dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ // 1.001.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ / vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ // 1.001.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ātmavān ko jitakrodho matimān ko 'nasūyakaḥ / kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge // 1.001.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me / maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram // 1.001.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

buddhimān nītimān vāgmī śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / vipulāṃso mahābāhuḥ kambugrīvo mahāhanuḥ // 1.001.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha / snehād vinayasaṃpannaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ // 1.001.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāvākyād udyuktān sarvarākṣasān / kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ // 1.001.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kabandhaṃ nāma rūpeṇa vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam / taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ // 1.001.045	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ / modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān // 1.009.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava / tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // 1.018.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ / virarāma mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.018.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
iti hṛdayamanovidāraṇaṃ; munivacanaṃ tad atīva śuśruvān / narapatir agamad bhayaṃ mahad; vyathitamanāḥ pracacāla cāsanāt // 1.018.020	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam / muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt // 1.019.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣo me rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ // 1.019.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ / anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ // 1.019.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ / yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi // 1.019.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

nirvighnā vratavaryā sā bhaviṣyati surakṣitā / ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi // 1.019.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)

na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam // 1.019.007.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata / caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya // 1.019.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te / kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava // 1.019.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)

tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ / suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ // 1.066.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ rājan pūjitaṃ sarvarājabhiḥ / mithilādhipa rājendra darśanīyaṃ yadīcchasi // 1.066.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata / viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ tau cobhau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 1.066.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahmañ janakair abhipūjitam / rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā // 1.066.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ / gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ // 1.066.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe / āropaṇe samāyoge vepane tolane 'pi vā // 1.066.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava / darśayaitan mahābhāga anayo rājaputrayoḥ // 1.066.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā śrutvā janakabhāṣitam / vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt // 1.066.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahman saṃspṛśāmīha pāṇinā / yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā // 1.066.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata / līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ // 1.066.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
paśyatāṃ nṛṣahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ raghunandanaḥ / āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ // 1.066.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tasya śabdo mahān āsīn nirghātasamaniḥsvanaḥ / bhūmikampaś ca sumahān parvatasyeva dīryataḥ // 1.066.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)

evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ / jaṭācīradharo rājñaḥ pratijñām anupālayan // 2.016.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ / nābhinandati durdharṣo yathāpuram ariṃdamaḥ // 2.016.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ / yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // 2.016.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ / tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // 2.016.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

daṇḍakāraṇyam eṣo 'ham ito gacchāmi satvaraḥ / avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // 2.016.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikayī / prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayām āsa rāghavam // 2.016.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ / bharataṃ mātulakulād upāvartayituṃ narāḥ // 2.016.039	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam / rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // 2.016.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate / naitat kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // 2.016.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran / pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // 2.016.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ / mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // 2.016.043	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāmo 'py utthāpya rājānaṃ kaikeyyābhipracoditaḥ / kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // 2.016.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

taṃ bāṣpaparipūrṇākṣaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma ha / lakṣmaṇaḥ paramakruddhaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ // 2.016.056	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na cāsya mahatīṃ lakṣmīṃ rājyanāśo 'pakarṣati / lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // 2.016.058	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām / sarvalokātigasyeva lakṣyate cittavikriyā // 2.016.059	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ / jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // 2.017.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'paśyat puruṣaṃ tatra vṛddhaṃ paramapūjitam / upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // 2.017.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ / striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // 2.017.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ / nyavedayanta tvaritā rāma mātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // 2.017.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā / prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // 2.017.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sā kṣaumavasanā hṛṣṭā nityaṃ vrataparāyaṇā / agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // 2.017.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham / dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // 2.017.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ / kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // 2.017.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vṛddhānāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām / prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // 2.017.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava / na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // 2.017.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe / api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // 2.017.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
sā bahūny amanojñāni vākyāni hṛdayacchidām / ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī // 2.017.023.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yo hi māṃ sevate kaś cid atha vāpy anuvartate / kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // 2.017.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava / atītāni prakāṅkṣantyā mayā duḥkhaparikṣayam // 2.017.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ / duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // 2.017.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate / prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // 2.017.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate; na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama / yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati; prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva // 2.017.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ; na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate / anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ; dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate // 2.017.030	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me; vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi / tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt; suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare // 2.017.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā; labheta kaś cid guru duḥkha karśitaḥ / gatāham adyaiva pareta saṃsadaṃ; vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai // 2.017.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā; bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam / vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat; sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī // 2.017.033	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram / uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // 2.018.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam / tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // 2.018.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ / nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // 2.018.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nāsyāparādhaṃ paśyāmi nāpi doṣaṃ tathā vidham / yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // 2.018.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ / amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // 2.018.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ / putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // 2.018.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāvad eva na jānāti kaś cid artham imaṃ naraḥ / tāvad eva mayā sādham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // 2.018.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava / kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // 2.018.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
nirmanuṣyām imāṃ sarvām ayodhyāṃ manujarṣabha / kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // 2.018.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati / sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // 2.018.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam / kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // 2.018.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anurakto 'smi bhāvena bhrātaraṃ devi tattvataḥ / satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // 2.018.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate / praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // 2.018.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ / devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // 2.018.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ / uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // 2.018.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā / yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // 2.018.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam / vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // 2.018.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi / śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // 2.018.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan / pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // 2.018.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham / tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // 2.018.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā / tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // 2.018.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām / ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // 2.018.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam / brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // 2.018.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ / uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // 2.018.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama / prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // 2.018.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā / gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // 2.018.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ / khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // 2.018.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa reṇukā jananī svayam / kṛttā paraśunāraṇye pitur vacanakāriṇā // 2.018.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam / pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // 2.018.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā / pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaś cin nāma hīyate // 2.018.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt / tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam // 2.018.032.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // 2.018.032.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam / dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // 2.018.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā / na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // 2.018.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum / pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // 2.018.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tad enāṃ visṛjānāryāṃ kṣatradharmāśritāṃ matim / dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // 2.018.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // 2.018.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: ma-vipulā)
anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam / śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me // 2.018.038.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // 2.018.038.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: na-vipulā)
yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān; na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam / adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite; vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ // 2.018.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ; parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān / athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ; cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam // 2.018.040	rucirā [jBsjg]
atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam / śvasantam iva nāgendraṃ roṣavisphāritekṣaṇam // 2.019.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam / uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // 2.019.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
saumitre yo 'bhiṣekārthe mama saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ / abhiṣekanivṛttyarthe so 'stu saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ // 2.019.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yasyā madabhiṣekārthaṃ mānasaṃ paritapyate / mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // 2.019.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe / manasi pratisaṃjātaṃ saumitre 'ham upekṣitum // 2.019.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na buddhipūrvaṃ nābuddhaṃ smarāmīha kadā cana / mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // 2.019.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
satyaḥ satyābhisaṃdhaś ca nityaṃ satyaparākramaḥ / paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // 2.019.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte / satyaṃ neti manas tāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // 2.019.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
abhiṣekavidhānaṃ tu tasmāt saṃhṛtya lakṣmaṇa / anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // 2.019.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mama pravrājanād adya kṛtakṛtyā nṛpātmajā / sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // 2.019.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mayi cīrājinadhare jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇi / gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // 2.019.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam / tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // 2.019.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane / rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // 2.019.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane / yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // 2.019.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram / bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // 2.019.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'bhiṣekanivṛttyarthaiḥ pravāsārthaiś ca durvacaiḥ / ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // 2.019.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kathaṃ prakṛtisaṃpannā rājaputrī tathāguṇā / brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // 2.019.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate / vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // 2.019.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kaś cid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān / yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃ cit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // 2.019.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sukhaduḥkhe bhayakrodhau lābhālābhau bhavābhavau / yasya kiṃ cit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // 2.019.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate / tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām // 2.019.021.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pratisaṃhāraya kṣipram ābhiṣecanikīṃ kriyām // 2.019.021.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne; mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā / daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ; jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam // 2.019.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ / śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // 2.020.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabha / niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // 2.020.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tasya duṣprativīkṣyaṃ tad bhrukuṭīsahitaṃ tadā / babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // 2.020.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ / tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // 2.020.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt / asthāne saṃbhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // 2.020.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dharmadoṣaprasaṅgena lokasyānatiśaṅkayā / kathaṃ hy etad asaṃbhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // 2.020.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yathā daivam aśauṇḍīraṃ śauṇḍīraḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ / kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // 2.020.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate / santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // 2.020.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
lokavidviṣṭam ārabdhaṃ tvadanyasyābhiṣecanam / yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate // 2.020.009.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // 2.020.009.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam / tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // 2.020.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate / vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // 2.020.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum / na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // 2.020.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ / yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // 2.020.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
atyaṅkuśam ivoddāmaṃ gajaṃ madabaloddhatam / pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // 2.020.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
lokapālāḥ samastās te nādya rāmābhiṣecanam / na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // 2.020.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ / araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // 2.020.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava / abhiṣekavighātena putrarājyāya vartate // 2.020.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā / prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // 2.020.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ūrdhvaṃ varṣasahasrānte prajāpālyam anantaram / āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // 2.020.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pūrvarājarṣivṛttyā hi vanavāso vidhīyate / prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // 2.020.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa ced rājany anekāgre rājyavibhramaśaṅkayā / naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // 2.020.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk / rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // 2.020.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava / aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // 2.020.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me / nāsirābandhanārthāya na śarāḥ stambhahetavaḥ // 2.020.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
amitradamanārthaṃ me sarvam etac catuṣṭayam / na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // 2.020.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asinā tīkṣṇadhāreṇa vidyuccalitavarcasā / pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // 2.020.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
khaḍganiṣpeṣaniṣpiṣṭair gahanā duścarā ca me / hastyaśvanarahastoruśirobhir bhavitā mahī // 2.020.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
khaḍgadhārā hatā me 'dya dīpyamānā ivādrayaḥ / patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // 2.020.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇe pragṛhītaśarāsane / kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // 2.020.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān / viniyokṣyāmy ahaṃ bāṇān nṛvājigajamarmasu // 2.020.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adya me 'straprabhāvasya prabhāvaḥ prabhaviṣyati / rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // 2.020.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adya candanasārasya keyūrāmokṣaṇasya ca / vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // 2.020.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ / abhiṣecanavighnasya kartṝṇāṃ te nivāraṇe // 2.020.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ; tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ / yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet; tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ // 2.020.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt; sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ / uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ; nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ // 2.020.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane / kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // 2.021.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
adṛṣṭaduḥkho dharmātmā sarvabhūtapriyaṃvadaḥ / mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // 2.021.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: na-vipulā)
yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate / kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // 2.021.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ka etac chraddadhec chrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam / guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // 2.021.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān / pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // 2.021.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati / ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // 2.021.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ / śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // 2.021.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite / bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // 2.021.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ / sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // 2.021.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ / śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 2.021.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubha darśanā / tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // 2.021.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // 2.021.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ / rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // 2.021.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca / varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // 2.021.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā / uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // 2.021.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam / naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyaṃ mṛgīṃ yathā // 2.021.016.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // 2.021.016.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt / jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca // 2.021.017.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // 2.021.017.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
bharataś cāpi dharmātmā sarvabhūtapriyaṃvadaḥ / bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // 2.021.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo; nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ / jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ; sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā // 2.022.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama / aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // 2.029.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam / uvācedaṃ dhanadhyakṣaṃ dhanam ānīyatām iti // 2.029.020.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // 2.029.020.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / dvijebhyo bālavṛddhebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo 'bhyadāpayat // 2.029.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ / ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat // 2.029.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt / nirdhano bahuputro 'smi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ // 2.029.023.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // 2.029.023.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ parihāsasamanvitam / gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā // 2.029.024.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // 2.029.024.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām / āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // 2.029.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan / manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // 2.029.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir; gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ / yaśobalaprītisukhopabṛṃhiṇīs; tad āśiṣaḥ pratyavadan mahātmanaḥ // 2.029.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu / jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // 2.030.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato gṛhīte duṣprekṣye aśobhetāṃ tadāyudhe / mālādāmabhir āsakte sītayā samalaṃkṛte // 2.030.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ prāsādaharmyāṇi vimānaśikharāṇi ca / adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // 2.030.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ / āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // 2.030.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
padātiṃ varjitacchatraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ / ūcur bahuvidhā vācaḥ śokopahatacetasaḥ // 2.030.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat / tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.030.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ / necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // 2.030.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api / tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // 2.030.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
aṅgarāgocitāṃ sītāṃ raktacandana sevinīm / varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // 2.030.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate / na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // 2.030.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
nirguṇasyāpi putrasyā kāthaṃ syād vipravāsanam / kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // 2.030.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ / rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // 2.030.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasmāt tasyopaghātena prajāḥ paramapīḍitāḥ / audakānīva sattvāni grīṣme salilasaṃkṣayāt // 2.030.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ / mūlasyevopaghātena vṛkṣaḥ puṣpaphalopagaḥ // 2.030.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ / gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // 2.030.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca / ekaduḥkhasukhā rāmam anugacchāma dhārmikam // 2.030.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
samuddhṛtanidhānāni paridhvastājirāṇi ca / upāttadhanadhānyāni hṛtasārāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 2.030.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rajasābhyavakīrṇāni parityaktāni daivataiḥ / asmattyaktāni veśmāni kaikeyī pratipadyatām // 2.030.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ / asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // 2.030.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bilāni daṃṣṭriṇaḥ sarve sānūni mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // 2.030.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ity evaṃ vividhā vāco nānājanasamīritāḥ / śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasaṃ // 2.030.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
pratīkṣamāṇo 'bhijanaṃ tadārtam; anārtarūpaḥ prahasann ivātha / jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ; pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ // 2.030.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā; rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam / vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ; pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham // 2.030.023	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo; vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ / sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn; nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me // 2.030.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rāmapreṣitaḥ kṣipraṃ saṃtāpakaluṣendriyaḥ / praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // 2.031.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ālokya tu mahāprājñaḥ paramākula cetasaṃ / rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // 2.031.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ / brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // 2.031.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // 2.031.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
gamiṣyati mahāraṇyaṃ taṃ paśya jagatīpate / vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // 2.031.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa satyavādī dharmātmā gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamaḥ / ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // 2.031.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
sumantrānaya me dārān ye ke cid iha māmakāḥ / dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // 2.031.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt / āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // 2.031.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā / pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // 2.031.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
ardhasaptaśatās tās tu pramadās tāmralocanāḥ / kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // 2.031.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
āgateṣu ca dāreṣu samavekṣya mahīpatiḥ / uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // 2.031.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā / jagāmābhimukhas tūrṇaṃ sakāśaṃ jagatīpateḥ // 2.031.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim / utpapātāsanāt tūrṇam ārtaḥ strījanasaṃvṛtaḥ // 2.031.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'bhidudrāva vegena rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśāṃ patiḥ / tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // 2.031.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ rāmo 'bhyapātat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ / visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // 2.031.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
strīsahasraninādaś ca saṃjajñe rājaveśmani / hāhā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // 2.031.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // 2.031.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ / prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // 2.031.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam / kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // 2.031.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada / lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // 2.031.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pratīkṣamāṇam avyagram anujñāṃ jagatīpateḥ / uvāca rarjā saṃprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // 2.031.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ rāghava kaikeyyā varadānena mohitaḥ / ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // 2.031.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / pratyuvācāñjaliṃ kṛtvā pitaraṃ vākyakovidaḥ // 2.031.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
bhavān varṣasahasrāya pṛthivyā nṛpate patiḥ / ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // 2.031.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
śreyase vṛddhaye tāta punarāgamanāya ca / gacchasvāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam // 2.031.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā / mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm // 2.031.027.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati / apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // 2.031.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
iyaṃ sarāṣṭrā sajanā dhanadhānyasamākulā / mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // 2.031.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: bha-vipulā)
apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ / na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // 2.031.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm / tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // 2.031.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā; mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām / ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan; vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum // 2.031.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ; saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām / śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ; tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat // 2.031.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano; mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye / yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate; vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha // 2.031.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ; na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm / na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan; vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā // 2.031.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane; girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca / vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ; sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ // 2.031.037	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sumantram aikṣvākaḥ pīḍito 'tra pratijñayā / sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // 2.032.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sūta ratnasusaṃpūrṇā caturvidhabalā camūḥ / rāgavasyānuyātrārthaṃ kṣipraṃ pratividhīyatām // 2.032.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rūpājīvā ca śālinyo vaṇijaś ca mahādhanāḥ / śobhayantu kumārasya vāhinīṃ suprasāritāḥ // 2.032.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ / teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // 2.032.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu / nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // 2.032.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: ra-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaś cid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ / tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // 2.032.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yajan puṇyeṣu deśeṣu visṛjaṃś cāptadakṣiṇāḥ / ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // 2.032.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bharataś ca mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati / sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // 2.032.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam / mukhaṃ cāpy agamāc cheṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // 2.032.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt / rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva // 2.032.010.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nirāsvādyatamaṃ śūnyaṃ bharato nābhipatsyate // 2.032.010.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
kaikeyyāṃ muktalajjāyāṃ vadantyām atidāruṇam / rājā daśaratho vākyam uvācāyatalocanām // 2.032.011.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // 2.032.011.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: na-vipulā)
kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt / tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat // 2.032.012.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // 2.032.012.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt / vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // 2.032.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ / śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.032.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān / sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // 2.032.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgaraḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan / asamañjaṃ vṛṣīṇvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // 2.032.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam / tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // 2.032.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ / sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // 2.032.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa / taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // 2.032.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane / mṛgayāṃ paryāṭaṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // 2.043.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)
nātyartham abhikāṅkṣāmi mṛgayāṃ sarayūvane / ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // 2.043.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā / taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayauvākyam udīrayan // 2.043.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tatra tripathagāṃ divyāṃ śivatoyām aśaivalām / dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣinisevitām // 2.044.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
haṃsasārasasaṃghuṣṭāṃ cakravākopakūjitām / śiṃśumaraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // 2.044.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)

rāmo 'bhiyāya taṃ ramyaṃ vṛkṣam ikṣvākunandanaḥ / rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.044.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sumantro 'py avatīryaiva mocayitvā hayottamān / vṛkṣamūlagataṃ rāmam upatasthe kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.044.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā / niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // 2.044.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)

tam ārtaḥ saṃpariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt / yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // 2.044.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha / arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // 2.044.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃ cit prītyā samupakalpitam / sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // 2.044.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tataś cīrottarāsaṅgaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām / jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // 2.044.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ / sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // 2.044.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
guho 'pi saha sūtena saumitrim anubhāṣayan / anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // 2.044.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato; yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ / adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā; tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī // 2.044.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam / guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.045.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā / pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // 2.045.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ / guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // 2.045.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana / bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // 2.045.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

bhaviṣyanti vane yāni tapovighnakarāṇi te / rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // 2.046.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ / yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // 2.046.046	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu; rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya / adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir; mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī // 2.046.078	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān; varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum / ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau; vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim // 2.046.079	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā indravaṃśā [ttjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām / rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // 2.047.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhagavann ita āsannaḥ paurajānapado janaḥ / āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ // 2.048.022.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // 2.048.022.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

tatra kuñjarayūthāni mṛgayūthāni cābhitaḥ / vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // 2.048.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam / śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // 2.056.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

vanavāsāya rāmasya pañcarātro 'dya gaṇyate / yaḥ śokahataharṣāyāḥ pañcavarṣopamo mama // 2.056.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate / adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // 2.056.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ / mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // 2.056.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam / ardharātre daśarathaḥ saṃsmaran duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // 2.057.003.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)

kaś cid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati / puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // 2.057.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam / rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // 2.057.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
labdhaśabdena kausalye kumāreṇa dhanuṣmatā / kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam // 2.057.008.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm / anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃ cij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // 2.057.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā / śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // 2.057.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate / dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // 2.058.049	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye / na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākyamam // 2.058.050	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam / mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // 2.058.051	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
padmapatrekṣaṇaṃ subhru sudaṃṣṭraṃ cārunāsikam / dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // 2.058.052	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

hā rāghava mahābāho hā mamāyāsa nāśana / rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // 2.058.056	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ; priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ / gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas; tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ // 2.058.057	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prātar evāpare 'hani / bandinaḥ paryupātiṣṭhaṃs tat pārthivaniveśanam // 2.059.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

haricandanasaṃpṛktam udakaṃ kāñcanair ghaṭaiḥ / āninyuḥ snānaśikṣājñā yathākālaṃ yathāvidhi // 2.059.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
maṅgalālambhanīyāni prāśanīyān upaskarān / upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārī bahulāḥ striyaḥ // 2.059.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha yāḥ kosalendrasya śayanaṃ pratyanantarāḥ / tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // 2.059.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ / pratisrotas tṛṇāgrāṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ saṃcakampire // 2.059.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha saṃvepamanānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam / yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // 2.059.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ / kareṇava ivāraṇye sthānapracyutayūthapāḥ // 2.059.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāsām ākranda śabdena sahasodgatacetane / kausalyā ca sumitrāca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // 2.059.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ; yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ / bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ; pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat // 2.059.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

vṛddhaś caivālpaputraś ca vaidehīm anicintayan / so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // 2.060.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tailadroṇyām athāmātyāḥ saṃveśya jagatīpatim / rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // 2.060.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bāhūn udyamya kṛpaṇā netraprasravaṇair mukhaiḥ / rudantyaḥ śokasaṃtaptāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayan // 2.060.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo; vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram / tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye; babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire // 2.060.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vyatītāyāṃ tu śarvaryām ādityasyodaye tataḥ / sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // 2.061.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ; nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam / kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ; tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñcaya // 2.061.025	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

tapyamānaṃ samājñāya vayasyāḥ priyavādinaḥ / āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // 2.063.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare / nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // 2.063.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priya vādibhiḥ / goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // 2.063.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi / sahasā cāpi saṃśantaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasaṃ // 2.063.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān / ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva pārvatān // 2.063.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān / mātṝṇāṃ manujavyāghraḥ sarvāsāṃ satyasaṃgaraḥ // 2.096.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāḥ pāṇibhiḥ sukhasparśair mṛdvaṅgulitalaiḥ śubhaiḥ / pramamārjū rajaḥ pṛṣṭhād rāmasyāyatalocanāḥ // 2.096.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝh saṃprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ / abhyavādayatāsaktaṃ śanai rāmād anantaram // 2.096.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā / vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // 2.096.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai; bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ / pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ; sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ // 2.096.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ; purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ / janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān; upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam // 2.096.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs; tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam / śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir; yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim // 2.096.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ; praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati / itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato; babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā // 2.096.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo; mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ / vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare; yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ // 2.096.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam / āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // 2.098.058	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan / suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // 2.098.064	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

śirasā tvābhiyāce 'haṃ kuruṣva karuṇāṃ mayi / bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // 2.098.067	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyata; prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ / na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān; matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 2.098.069	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave; samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ / na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat; sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ // 2.098.070	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās; tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ / tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ; praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha // 2.098.071	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / pratyuvaca tataḥ śrīmāñ jñātimadhye 'tisatkṛtaḥ // 2.099.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)

so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ / śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // 2.099.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

evaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve pratītā rājanandana / tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // 2.099.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ; vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām / gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // 2.099.017	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ; varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām / eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ; chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye // 2.099.018	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ; saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram / catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ; satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam // 2.099.019	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]

triśaṅkor abhavat sūnur dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ / dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo vyajāyata // 2.102.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit / yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // 2.102.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata / yasyaite pratirājāna udapadyanta śatravaḥ // 2.102.014.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // 2.102.014.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // 2.102.015.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: ma-vipulā)

sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani / tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // 2.102.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā / gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // 2.102.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat / iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // 2.102.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam / jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // 2.102.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ; sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi / prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ; prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ // 2.102.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ / abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // 2.103.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bharatasya vacaḥ kurvan yācamānasya rāghava / ātmānaṃ nātivartes tvaṃ satyadharmaparākrama // 2.103.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam / pratyuvāca samāsīnaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ // 2.103.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama / ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // 2.103.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

tam apratimatejobhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ romaharṣaṇam / vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // 2.104.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam / na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // 2.104.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭho; duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ / sa tv eva mātṝr abhivādya sarvā; rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ // 2.104.025	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā / pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // 2.105.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

nivṛtto 'ham anujñāto rāmeṇa sumahātmanā / ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // 2.105.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // 2.105.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)

mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati / jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ // 3.004.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
ahaṃ jñātvā naravyāghra vartamānam adūrataḥ / brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim // 3.004.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu śakratulyabalena vai / śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // 3.004.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām / yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ // 3.004.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit / śarabhaṅgo mahātejāḥ praviveśa hutāśanam // 3.004.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ / jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam // 3.004.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa ca pāvakasaṃkāśaḥ kumāraḥ samapadyata / utthāyāgnicayāt tasmāc charabhaṅgo vyarocata // 3.004.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata // 3.004.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ; pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha / pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ; nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha // 3.004.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ / paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ // 3.005.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām / idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ // 3.005.019.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhavatām arthasiddhyartham āgato 'haṃ yadṛcchayā / tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ // 3.005.020.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān // 3.005.020.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ; dharme dhṛtātmā sahalakṣmaṇena / tapodhanaiś cāpi sahārya vṛttaḥ; sutīṣkṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ // 3.005.021	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

tataḥ sthalam upāruhya parvatasyāvidūrataḥ / khyātaḥ pañcavaṭīty eva nityapuṣpitakānanaḥ // 3.012.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / sātkṛtyāmantrayām āsa tam ṛṣiṃ satyavādinam // 3.012.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tau tu tenābhyanujñātau kṛtapādābhivandanau / tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // 3.012.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau; viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau / yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā; prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau // 3.012.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha pañcavaṭīṃ gacchann antarā raghunandanaḥ / āsasāda mahākāyaṃ gṛdhraṃ bhīmaparākramam // 3.013.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau / menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // 3.013.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva / uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // 3.013.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ / sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // 3.013.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca / ācacakṣe dvijas tasmai sarvabhūtasamudbhavam // 3.013.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pūrvakāle mahābāho ye prajāpatayo 'bhavan / tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // 3.013.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kardamaḥ prathamas teṣāṃ vikṛtas tadanantaram / śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // 3.013.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ / pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // 3.013.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dakṣo vivasvān aparo 'riṣṭanemiś ca rāghava / kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // 3.013.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam / ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ // 3.013.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api / tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // 3.013.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa / ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // 3.013.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

narakaṃ kālakaṃ caiva kālakāpi vyajāyata / krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // 3.013.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāmrāpi suṣuve kanyāḥ pañcaitā lokaviśrutāḥ / ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // 3.013.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

daśakrodhavaśā rāma vijajñe 'py ātmasaṃbhavāḥ / mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // 3.013.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama / ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // 3.013.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ / golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // 3.013.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ / jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // 3.013.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
so 'haṃ vāsasahāyas te bhaviṣyāmi yadīcchasi / sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // 3.013.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo; mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat / pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ; jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // 3.013.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ; sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā / jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo; ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ // 3.013.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pañcavaṭīṃ gatvā nānāvyālamṛgāyutām / uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.014.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa / tādṛśo dṛśyatāṃ deśaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭajalāśayaḥ // 3.014.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

parṇaśālāṃ suvipulāṃ tatra saṃghātamṛttikām / sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām // 3.014.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

jarājarjaritaiḥ parṇaiḥ śīrṇakesarakarṇikaiḥ / nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ // 3.015.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu / ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet // 3.053.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājyabhraṣṭena dīnena tāpasena gatāyuṣā / kiṃ kariṣyasi rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇālpatejasā // 3.053.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava / yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha // 3.053.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane / kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ // 3.053.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ / dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām // 3.053.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane / vikrameṇa nayed yas tvāṃ madbāhuparipālitām // 3.053.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya / abhiṣekodakaklinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām // 3.053.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam / yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi // 3.053.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iha sarvāṇi mālyāni divyagandhāni maithili / bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha // 3.053.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me / vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam // 3.053.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham / vadanaṃ padmasaṃkāśaṃ vimalaṃ cārudarśanam // 3.053.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane / alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopa kṛtena te // 3.053.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ārṣo 'yaṃ daivaniṣyando yas tvām abhigamiṣyati / etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau // 3.053.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te / nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ // 3.053.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ cin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha / evam uktvā daśagrīvo maithilīṃ janakātmajām // 3.053.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kṛtāntavaśam āpanno mameyam iti manyate // 3.053.035	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā / tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 3.054.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājā daśaratho nāma dharmasetur ivācalaḥ / satyasandhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ // 3.054.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ / dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama // 3.054.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ siṃhaskandho mahādyutiḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇāṃ hariṣyati // 3.054.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt / śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ // 3.054.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ / rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā // 3.054.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya jyāvipramuktās te śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ / śarīraṃ vidhamiṣyanti gaṅgākūlam ivormayaḥ // 3.054.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa / utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase // 3.054.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
sa te jīvitaśeṣasya rāghavo 'ntakaro balī / paśor yūpagatasyeva jīvitaṃ tava durlabham // 3.054.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā / rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam // 3.054.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā / sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha // 3.054.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
gatāyus tvaṃ gataśrīko gatasattvo gatendriyaḥ / laṅkā vaidhavyasaṃyuktā tvatkṛtena bhaviṣyati // 3.054.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati / yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt // 3.054.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ / nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake // 3.054.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham / apaneṣyati gātrebhyaḥ śaravarṣeṇa saṃyuge // 3.054.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama / ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca // 3.054.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā / dvijātimantrasaṃpūtā caṇḍālenāvamarditum // 3.054.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā / nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa // 3.054.019.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: ma-vipulā)
na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ // 3.054.019.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā paruṣaṃ romaharṣaṇam / pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ // 3.054.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini / kālenānena nābhyeṣi yadi māṃ cāruhāsini // 3.054.022.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ // 3.054.022.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ / rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.054.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ / darpam asyā vineṣyantu māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥ // 3.054.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ / kṛtaprāñjalayo bhūtvā maithilīṃ paryavārayan // 3.054.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ / pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm // 3.054.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśokavanikāmadhye maithilī nīyatām iti / tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham uṣmābhiḥ parivāritā // 3.054.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm / ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva // 3.054.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasyo rāvaṇena tāḥ / aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām // 3.054.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣair nānāpuṣpaphalair vṛtām / sarvakālamadaiś cāpi dvijaiḥ samupasevitām // 3.054.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sā tu śokaparītāṅgī maithilī janakātmajā / rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā // 3.054.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī; virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā / patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ; vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā // 3.054.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa carantaṃ kāmarūpiṇam / nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata // 3.055.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)
tasya saṃtvaramāṇasya draṣṭukāmasya maithilīm / krūrasvaro 'tha gomāyur vinanādāsya pṛṣṭhataḥ // 3.055.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam / cintayām āsa gomāyoḥ svareṇa pariśaṅkitaḥ // 3.055.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā / svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā // 3.055.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam / vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi // 3.055.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm / tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati // 3.055.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ / kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām // 3.055.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ / hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha // 3.055.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane / janasthānanimittaṃ hi kṛtavairo 'smi rākṣasaiḥ // 3.055.009.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca // 3.055.009.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam / ātmanaś cāpanayanaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa rakṣasā // 3.055.010.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
ājagāma janasthānaṃ rāghavaḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ // 3.055.010.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
taṃ dīnamānasaṃ dīnam āsedur mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān // 3.055.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni mahāghorāṇi rāghavaḥ / tato lakṣaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham // 3.055.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato 'vidūre rāmeṇa samīyāya sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā // 3.055.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam / vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite // 3.055.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ / uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat // 3.055.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām / sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti // 3.055.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā / vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpa rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ // 3.055.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me / api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe // 3.055.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idaṃ hi rakṣomṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ; pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam / hataṃ kathaṃ cin mahatā śrameṇa; sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva // 3.055.019	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ; cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram / asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā; hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā // 3.055.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ / paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā // 3.056.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha / kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ // 3.056.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājyabhraṣṭasya dīnasya daṇḍakān paridhāvataḥ / kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā // 3.056.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum / kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā // 3.056.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa / vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām // 3.056.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama / kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati // 3.056.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi / kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati // 3.056.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: bha-vipulā)
saputrarājyāṃ siddhārthāṃ mṛtaputrā tapasvinī / upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm // 3.056.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ / suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // 3.056.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi mām āśramagataṃ vaidehī nābhibhāṣate / punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // 3.056.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā / tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī // 3.056.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī / madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ // 3.056.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sarvathā rakṣasā tena jihmena sudurātmanā / vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam // 3.056.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama / trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ // 3.056.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane / pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram // 3.056.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
duḥkhitāḥ kharaghātena rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ / taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 3.056.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aho 'smi vyasane magnaḥ sarvathā ripunāśana / kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam // 3.056.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ / ājagāma janasthānaṃ tvarayā sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.056.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ; kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca / viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ; pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam // 3.056.019	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro; vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃś cit / etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau; prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva // 3.056.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
athāśramād upāvṛttam antarā raghunandanaḥ / paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ // 3.057.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm / yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā // 3.057.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me / dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi // 3.057.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt // 3.060.006	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
