sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ vālī lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam / abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ paruṣaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // 4.017.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
parāṅmukhavadhaṃ kṛtvā ko nu prāptas tvayā guṇaḥ / yad ahaṃ yuddhasaṃrabdhas tvatkṛte nidhanaṃ gataḥ // 4.017.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kulīnaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tejasvī caritavrataḥ / rāmaḥ karuṇavedī ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ // 4.017.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sānukrośo mahotsāhaḥ samayajño dṛḍhavrataḥ / iti te sarvabhūtāni kathayanti yaśo bhuvi // 4.017.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tān guṇān saṃpradhāryāham agryaṃ cābhijanaṃ tava / tārayā pratiṣiddhaḥ san sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ // 4.017.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na mām anyena saṃrabdhaṃ pramattaṃ veddhum arhasi / iti me buddhir utpannā babhūvādarśane tava // 4.017.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na tvāṃ vinihatātmānaṃ dharmadhvajam adhārmikam / jāne pāpasamācāraṃ tṛṇaiḥ kūpam ivāvṛtam // 4.017.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
satāṃ veṣadharaṃ pāpaṃ pracchannam iva pāvakam / nāhaṃ tvām abhijānāni dharmacchadmābhisaṃvṛtam // 4.017.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā nāpakaromy aham / na ca tvāṃ pratijāne 'haṃ kasmāt tvaṃ haṃsy akilbiṣam // 4.017.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
phalamūlāśanaṃ nityaṃ vānaraṃ vanagocaram / mām ihāpratiyudhyantam anyena ca samāgatam // 4.017.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvaṃ narādhipateḥ putraḥ pratītaḥ priyadarśanaḥ / liṅgam apy asti te rājan dṛśyate dharmasaṃhitam // 4.017.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kaḥ kṣatriyakule jātaḥ śrutavān naṣṭasaṃśayaḥ / dharmaliṅga praticchannaḥ krūraṃ karma samācaret // 4.017.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāma rājakule jāto dharmavān iti viśrutaḥ / abhavyo bhavyarūpeṇa kimarthaṃ paridhāvasi // 4.017.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāma dānaṃ kṣamā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiparākramau / pārthivānāṃ guṇā rājan daṇḍaś cāpy apakāriṣu // 4.017.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vayaṃ vanacarā rāma mṛgā mūlaphalāśanāḥ / eṣā prakṛtir asmākaṃ puruṣas tvaṃ nareśvaraḥ // 4.017.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhūmir hiraṇyaṃ rūpyaṃ ca nigrahe kāraṇāni ca / tatra kas te vane lobho madīyeṣu phaleṣu vā // 4.017.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau nigrahānugrahāv api / rājavṛttir asaṃkīrṇā na nṛpāḥ kāmavṛttayaḥ // 4.017.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu kāmapradhānaś ca kopanaś cānavasthitaḥ / rājavṛttaiś ca saṃkīrṇaḥ śarāsanaparāyaṇaḥ // 4.017.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na te 'sty apacitir dharme nārthe buddhir avasthitā / indriyaiḥ kāmavṛttaḥ san kṛṣyase manujeśvara // 4.017.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hatvā bāṇena kākutstha mām ihānaparādhinam / kiṃ vakṣyasi satāṃ madhye karma kṛtvā jugupsitam // 4.017.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājahā brahmahā goghnaś coraḥ prāṇivadhe rataḥ / nāstikaḥ parivettā ca sarve nirayagāminaḥ // 4.017.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adhāryaṃ carma me sadbhī romāṇy asthi ca varjitam / abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni tvadvidhair dharmacāribhiḥ // 4.017.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣatreṇa rāghava / śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ // 4.017.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
carma cāsthi ca me rājan na spṛśanti manīṣiṇaḥ / abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni so 'haṃ pañcanakho hataḥ // 4.017.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvayā nāthena kākutstha na sanāthā vasuṃdharā / pramadā śīlasaṃpannā dhūrtena patitā yathā // 4.017.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śaṭho naikṛtikaḥ kṣudro mithyā praśritamānasaḥ / kathaṃ daśarathena tvaṃ jātaḥ pāpo mahātmanā // 4.017.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
chinnacāritryakakṣyeṇa satāṃ dharmātivartinā / tyaktadharmāṅkuśenāhaṃ nihato rāmahastinā // 4.017.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dṛśyamānas tu yudhyethā mayā yudhi nṛpātmaja / adya vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyes tvaṃ nihato mayā // 4.017.039	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvayādṛśyena tu raṇe nihato 'haṃ durāsadaḥ / prasuptaḥ pannageneva naraḥ pānavaśaṃ gataḥ // 4.017.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
sugrīvapriyakāmena yad ahaṃ nihatas tvayā / kaṇṭhe baddhvā pradadyāṃ te 'nihataṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe // 4.017.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nyastāṃ sāgaratoye vā pātāle vāpi maithilīm / jānayeyaṃ tavādeśāc chvetām aśvatarīm iva // 4.017.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yuktaṃ yat prapnuyād rājyaṃ sugrīvaḥ svargate mayi / ayuktaṃ yad adharmeṇa tvayāhaṃ nihato raṇe // 4.017.043	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ lokaḥ kālena viniyujyate / kṣamaṃ ced bhavatā prāptam uttaraṃ sādhu cintyatām // 4.017.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ity evam uktvā pariśuṣkavaktraḥ; śarābhighātād vyathito mahātmā / samīkṣya rāmaṃ ravisaṃnikāśaṃ; tūṣṇīṃ babhūvāmararājasūnuḥ // 4.017.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ity uktaḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam / paruṣaṃ vālinā rāmo nihatena vicetasā // 4.018.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ niṣprabham ivādityaṃ muktatoyam ivāmbudam / uktavākyaṃ hariśreṣṭham upaśāntam ivānalam // 4.018.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dharmārthaguṇasaṃpannaṃ harīśvaram anuttamam / adhikṣiptas tadā rāmaḥ paścād vālinam abravīt // 4.018.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca samayaṃ cāpi laukikam / avijñāya kathaṃ bālyān mām ihādya vigarhase // 4.018.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
apṛṣṭvā buddhisaṃpannān vṛddhān ācāryasaṃmatān / saumya vānaracāpalyāt tvaṃ māṃ vaktum ihecchasi // 4.018.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ikṣvākūṇām iyaṃ bhūmiḥ saśailavanakānanā / mṛgapakṣimanuṣyāṇāṃ nigrahānugrahāv api // 4.018.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāṃ pālayati dharmātmā bharataḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ / dharmakāmārthatattvajño nigrahānugrahe rataḥ // 4.018.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau yasmin satyaṃ ca susthitam / vikramaś ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśakālavit // 4.018.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya dharmakṛtādeśā vayam anye ca pārthivaḥ / carāmo vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ dharmasaṃtānam icchavaḥ // 4.018.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasmin nṛpatiśārdūla bharate dharmavatsale / pālayaty akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ kaś cared dharmanigraham // 4.018.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
te vayaṃ mārgavibhraṣṭaṃ svadharme parame sthitāḥ / bharatājñāṃ puraskṛtya nigṛhṇīmo yathāvidhi // 4.018.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu saṃkliṣṭadharmā ca karmaṇā ca vigarhitaḥ / kāmatantrapradhānaś ca na sthito rājavartmani // 4.018.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitā caiva yaś ca vidyāṃ prayacchati / trayas te pitaro jñeyā dharme ca pathi vartinaḥ // 4.018.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yavīyān ātmanaḥ putraḥ śiṣyaś cāpi guṇoditaḥ / putravat te trayaś cintyā dharmaś ced atra kāraṇam // 4.018.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sūkṣmaḥ paramadurjñeyaḥ satāṃ dharmaḥ plavaṃgama / hṛdisthaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmā veda śubhāśubham // 4.018.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
capalaś capalaiḥ sārdhaṃ vānarair akṛtātmabhiḥ / jātyandha iva jātyandhair mantrayan drakṣyase nu kim // 4.018.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ahaṃ tu vyaktatām asya vacanasya bravīmi te / na hi māṃ kevalaṃ roṣāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // 4.018.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad etat kāraṇaṃ paśya yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mayā hataḥ / bhrātur vartasi bhāryāyāṃ tyaktvā dharmaṃ sanātanam // 4.018.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asya tvaṃ dharamāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / rumāyāṃ vartase kāmāt snuṣāyāṃ pāpakarmakṛt // 4.018.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad vyatītasya te dharmāt kāmavṛttasya vānara / bhrātṛbhāryābhimarśe 'smin daṇḍo 'yaṃ pratipāditaḥ // 4.018.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi dharmaviruddhasya lokavṛttād apeyuṣaḥ / daṇḍād anyatra paśyāmi nigrahaṃ hariyūthapa // 4.018.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ / nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā // 4.018.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
āryeṇa mama māndhātrā vyasanaṃ ghoram īpsitam / śramaṇena kṛte pāpe yathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā // 4.018.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anyair api kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramattair vasudhādhipaiḥ / prāyaścittaṃ ca kurvanti tena tac chāmyate rajaḥ // 4.018.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad alaṃ paritāpena dharmataḥ parikalpitaḥ / vadho vānaraśārdūla na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ // 4.018.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vāgurābhiś ca pāśaiś ca kūṭaiś ca vividhair narāḥ / praticchannāś ca dṛśyāś ca gṛhṇanti subahūn mṛgān // 4.018.034.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pradhāvitān vā vitrastān visrabdhān ativiṣṭhitān // 4.018.034.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: ma-vipulā)

yānti rājarṣayaś cātra mṛgayāṃ dharmakovidāḥ / tasmāt tvaṃ nihato yuddhe mayā bāṇena vānara // 4.018.036.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ayudhyan pratiyudhyan vā yasmāc chākhāmṛgo hy asi // 4.018.036.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

yat tvam āttha naraśreṣṭha tad evaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / prativaktuṃ prakṛṣṭe hi nāpakṛṣṭas tu śaknuyāt // 4.018.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yad ayuktaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ pramādād vākyam apriyam / tatrāpi khalu me doṣaṃ kartuṃ nārhasi rāghava // 4.018.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na tv ātmānam ahaṃ śoce na tārāṃ nāpi bāndhavān / yathā putraṃ guṇaśreṣṭham aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam // 4.018.046	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sugrīve cāṅgade caiva vidhatsva matim uttamām / tvaṃ hi śāstā ca goptā ca kāryākāryavidhau sthitaḥ // 4.018.048	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yā te narapate vṛttir bharate lakṣmaṇe ca yā / sugrīve cāṅgade rājaṃs tāṃ cintayitum arhasi // 4.018.049	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tvayā hy anugṛhītena śakyaṃ rājyam upāsitum / tvadvaśe vartamānena tava cittānuvartinā // 4.018.051	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tam āśvāsayad rāmo vālinaṃ vyaktadarśanam // 4.018.052	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
na vayaṃ bhavatā cintyā nāpy ātmā harisattama / vayaṃ bhavadviśeṣeṇa dharmataḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ // 4.018.053	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
daṇḍye yaḥ pātayed daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyo yaś cāpi daṇḍyate / kāryakāraṇasiddhārthāv ubhau tau nāvasīdataḥ // 4.018.054	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad bhavān daṇḍasaṃyogād asmād vigatakalmaṣaḥ / gataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ dharmyāṃ dharmadṛṣṭtena vartmanā // 4.018.055	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tasya vākyaṃ madhuraṃ mahātmanaḥ; samāhitaṃ dharmapathānuvartinaḥ / niśamya rāmasya raṇāvamardino; vacaḥ suyuktaṃ nijagāda vānaraḥ // 4.018.056	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śarābhitaptena vicetasā mayā; pradūṣitas tvaṃ yad ajānatā prabho / idaṃ mahendropamabhīmavikrama; prasāditas tvaṃ kṣama me mahīśvara // 4.018.057	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa vānaramahārājaḥ śayānaḥ śaravikṣataḥ / pratyukto hetumadvākyair nottaraṃ pratyapadyata // 4.019.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśmabhiḥ paribhinnāṅgaḥ pādapair āhato bhṛśam / rāmabāṇena cākrānto jīvitānte mumoha saḥ // 4.019.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ bhāryābāṇamokṣeṇa rāmadattena saṃyuge / hataṃ plavagaśārdūlaṃ tārā śuśrāva vālinam // 4.019.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sā saputrāpriyaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ bhartuḥ sudāruṇam / niṣpapāta bhṛśaṃ trastā vividhād girigahvarāt // 4.019.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yathoktam etat tava sarvam īpsitaṃ; narendra kartā nacirād dharīśvaraḥ / śaratpratīkṣaḥ kṣamatām imaṃ bhavāñ; jalaprapātaṃ ripunigrahe dhṛtaḥ // 4.027.046	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

sa kāminaṃ dīnam adīnasattvaḥ; śokābhipannaṃ samudīrṇakopam / narendrasūnur naradevaputraṃ; rāmānujaḥ pūrvajam ity uvāca // 4.030.001	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na vānaraḥ sthāsyati sādhuvṛtte; na maṃsyate kāryaphalānuṣaṅgān / na bhakṣyate vānararājyalakṣmīṃ; tathā hi nābhikramate 'sya buddhiḥ // 4.030.002	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
matikṣayād grāmyasukheṣu saktas; tava prasādāpratikārabuddhiḥ / hato 'grajaṃ paśyatu vālinaṃ sa; na rājyam evaṃ viguṇasya deyam // 4.030.003	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na dhāraye kopam udīrṇavegaṃ; nihanmi sugrīvam asatyam adya / haripravīraiḥ saha vāliputro; narendrapatnyā vicayaṃ karotu // 4.030.004	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tam āttabāṇāsanam utpatantaṃ; niveditārthaṃ raṇacaṇḍakopam / uvaca rāmaḥ paravīrahantā; svavekṣitaṃ sānunayaṃ ca vākyam // 4.030.005	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [ntjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg])
na hi vai tvadvidho loke pāpam evaṃ samācaret / pāpam āryeṇa yo hanti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ // 4.030.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nedam adya tvayā grāhyaṃ sādhuvṛttena lakṣmaṇa / tāṃ prītim anuvartasva pūrvavṛttaṃ ca saṃgatam // 4.030.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāmopahitayā vācā rūkṣāṇi parivarjayan / vaktum arhasi sugrīvaṃ vyatītaṃ kālaparyaye // 4.030.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so' grajenānuśiṣṭārtho yathāvat puruṣarṣabhaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā // 4.030.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ śubhamatiḥ prājño bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ / lakṣmaṇaḥ pratisaṃrabdho jagāma bhavanaṃ kapeḥ // 4.030.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śakrabāṇāsanaprakhyaṃ dhanuḥ kālāntakopamaḥ / pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhaṃ mandaraḥ sānumān iva // 4.030.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yathoktakārī vacanam uttaraṃ caiva sottaram / bṛhaspatisamo buddhyā mattvā rāmānujas tadā // 4.030.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

sālatālāśvakarṇāṃś ca tarasā pātayan bahūn / paryasyan girikūṭāni drumān anyāṃś ca vegataḥ // 4.030.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śilāś ca śakalīkurvan padbhyāṃ gaja ivāśugaḥ / dūram ekapadaṃ tyaktvā yayau kāryavaśād drutam // 4.030.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tām apaśyad balākīrṇāṃ harirājamahāpurīm / durgām ikṣvākuśārdūlaḥ kiṣkindhāṃ girisaṃkaṭe // 4.030.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
roṣāt prasphuramāṇauṣṭhaḥ sugrīvaṃ prati kalṣmaṇaḥ / dadarśa vānarān bhīmān kiṣkindhāyā bahiścarān // 4.030.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śailaśṛṅgāṇi śataśaḥ pravṛddhāṃś ca mahīruhān / jagṛhuḥ kuñjaraprakhyā vānarāḥ parvatāntare // 4.030.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tān gṛhītapraharaṇān harīn dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣmaṇaḥ / babhūva dviguṇaṃ kruddho bahvindhana ivānalaḥ // 4.030.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ te bhayaparītāṅgāḥ kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā plavaṃgamāḥ / kālamṛtyuyugāntābhaṃ śataśo vidrutā diśaḥ // 4.030.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ sugrīvabhavanaṃ praviśya haripuṃgavāḥ / krodham āgamanaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇasya nyavedayan // 4.030.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

tayor eko dhanuṣpāṇir dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ / yasya bhītāḥ pravepante nādān muñcanti vānarāḥ // 4.030.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tato gāḍhaṃ nipatitā gṛhya hastau parasparam / idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam // 4.051.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: bha-vipulā)
etan naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ / tvāṃ caivopagatāḥ sarve paridyūnā bubhukṣitāḥ // 4.051.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇā bubhukṣayā / brūhi pratyupakārārthaṃ kiṃ te kurvantu vānarāḥ // 4.051.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktā tu sarvajñā vānarais taiḥ svayaṃprabhā / pratyuvāca tataḥ sarvān idaṃ vānarayūthapam // 4.051.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharmacāriṇi / yaḥ kṛtaḥ samayo 'smākaṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā // 4.052.002.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tathā bruvati tāre tu tārādhipativarcasi / atha mene hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ hanumān aṅgadena tat // 4.053.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kāmaṃ khalu daśagrīvas tejobalasamanvitaḥ / bhavatāṃ tu samarthānāṃ na kiṃ cid api duṣkaram // 4.058.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

punar evāṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn harisattamaḥ / sarve balavatāṃ śreṣṭhā bhavanto dṛḍhavikramāḥ // 4.063.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vyapadeśya kule jātāḥ pūjitāś cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ / na hi vo gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit // 4.063.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bruvadhvaṃ yasya yā śaktir gamane plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.063.024	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
tato 'ṅgadavacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ / svaṃ svaṃ gatau samutsāham āhus tatra yathākramam // 4.064.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ / maindaś ca dvividaś caiva suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃs tathā // 4.064.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
ābabhāṣe gajas tatra plaveyaṃ daśayojanam / gavākṣo yojanāny āha gamiṣyāmīti viṃśatim // 4.064.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
gavayo vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / triṃśataṃ tu gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.064.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śarabho vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / catvāriṃśad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vānarāṃs tu mahātejā abravīd gandhamādanaḥ / yojanānāṃ gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
maindas tu vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / yojanānāṃ paraṃ ṣaṣṭim ahaṃ plavitum utsahe // 4.064.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tatra mahātejā dvividaḥ pratyabhāṣata / gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatiṃ yojanāny aham // 4.064.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
suṣeṇas tu hariśreṣṭhaḥ proktavān kapisattamān / aśītiṃ yojanānāṃ tu plaveyaṃ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.064.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra sarvāṃs tān anumānya ca / tato vṛddhatamas teṣāṃ jāmbavān pratyabhāṣata // 4.064.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pūrvam asmākam apy āsīt kaś cid gatiparākramaḥ / te vayaṃ vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam // 4.064.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ tu naivaṃ gate śakyam idaṃ kāryam upekṣitum / yad arthaṃ kapirājaś ca rāmaś ca kṛtaniścayau // 4.064.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāmprataṃ kālabhedena yā gatis tāṃ nibodhata / navatiṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāṃś ca sarvān hariśreṣṭhāñ jāmbavān punar abravīt / na khalv etāvad evāsīd gamane me parākramaḥ // 4.064.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mayā mahābalaiś caiva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ / pradakṣiṇīkṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kramamāṇas trivikramaḥ // 4.064.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ plavane mandavikramaḥ / yauvane ca tadāsīn me balam apratimaṃ paraiḥ // 4.064.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃpraty etāvatīṃ śaktiṃ gamane tarkayāmy aham / naitāvatā ca saṃsiddhiḥ kāryasyāsya bhaviṣyati // 4.064.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
athottaram udārārtham abravīd aṅgadas tadā / anumānya mahāprājño jāmbavantaṃ mahākapim // 4.064.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aham etad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ śataṃ mahat / nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syān na veti na niścitam // 4.064.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam uvāca hariśreṣṭho jāmbavān vākyakovidaḥ / jñāyate gamane śaktis tava haryṛkṣasattama // 4.064.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kāmaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā na hy eṣa vidhir ucyate / yojanānāṃ bhavāñ śakto gantuṃ pratinivartitum // 4.064.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ kathaṃ cana / bhavatāyaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ preṣyaḥ plavagasattama // 4.064.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
bhavān kalatram asmākaṃ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ / svāmī kalatraṃ sainyasya gatir eṣā paraṃtapa // 4.064.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
tasmāt kalatravat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān / api caitasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama // 4.064.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kāryavidāṃ nayaḥ / mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpaphalādayaḥ // 4.064.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad bhavān asyā kāryasya sādhane satyavikramaḥ / buddhivikramasaṃpanno hetur atra paraṃtapaḥ // 4.064.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
guruś ca guruputraś ca tvaṃ hi naḥ kapisattama / bhavantam āśritya vayaṃ samarthā hy arthasādhane // 4.064.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
uktavākyaṃ mahāprājñaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahākapiḥ / pratyuvācottaraṃ vākyaṃ vālisūnur athāṅgadaḥ // 4.064.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi nāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyo vānarapuṃgavaḥ / punaḥ khalv idam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ prāyopaveśanam // 4.064.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hy akṛtvā haripateḥ saṃdeśaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / tatrāpi gatvā prāṇānāṃ paśyāmi parirakṣaṇam // 4.064.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: ma-vipulā)
sa hi prasāde cātyarthaṃ kope ca harir īśvaraḥ / atītya tasya saṃdeśaṃ vināśo gamane bhavet // 4.064.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tad yathā hy asya kāryasya na bhavaty anyathā gatiḥ / tad bhavān eva dṛṣṭārthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati // 4.064.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'ṅgadena tadā vīraḥ pratyuktaḥ plavagarṣabhaḥ / jāmbavān uttaraṃ vākyaṃ provācedaṃ tato 'ṅgadam // 4.064.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asya te vīra kāryasya na kiṃ cit parihīyate / eṣa saṃcodayāmy enaṃ yaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyati // 4.064.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ pratītaṃ plavatāṃ variṣṭham; ekāntam āśritya sukhopaviṣṭam / saṃcodayām āsa haripravīro; haripravīraṃ hanumantam eva // 4.064.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anekaśatasāhasrīṃ viṣaṇṇāṃ harivāhinīm / jāmbavān samudīkṣyaivaṃ hanumantam athābravīt // 4.065.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vīra vānaralokasya sarvaśāstram athābravīt / tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kiṃ na jalpasi // 4.065.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hanuman harirājasya sugrīvasya samo hy asi / rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi tejasā ca balena ca // 4.065.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ariṣṭaneminaḥ putrau vainateyo mahābalaḥ / garutmān iva vikhyāta uttamaḥ sarvapakṣiṇām // 4.065.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bahuśo hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahābalaḥ / bhujagān uddharan pakṣī mahāvego mahāyaśāḥ // 4.065.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

abhiśāpād abhūt tāta vānarī kāmarūpiṇī / duhitā vānarendrasya kuñjarasya mahātmanaḥ // 4.065.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kapitve cārusarvāṅgī kadā cit kāmarūpiṇī / mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā yauvanottamaśālinī // 4.065.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
acarat parvatasyāgre prāvṛḍambudasaṃnibhe / vicitramālyābharaṇā mahārhakṣaumavāsinī // 4.065.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)

viṣāṇṇā harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase / vikramasva mahāvego viṣṇus trīn vikramān iva // 4.065.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tu vai jāmbavatābhicoditaḥ; pratītavegaḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ / praharṣayaṃs tāṃ harivīra vāhinīṃ; cakāra rūpaṃ mahad ātmanas tadā // 4.065.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthā ivāmbare // 4.066.016.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

vainateyasya vā śaktir mama vā mārutasya vā / ṛte suparṇarājānaṃ mārutaṃ vā mahābalam // 4.066.020.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi yo māṃ plutam anuvrajet // 4.066.020.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

bhaviṣyati hi me rūpaṃ plavamānasya sāgaram / viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva // 4.066.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
buddhyā cāhaṃ prapaśyāmi manaś ceṣṭā ca me tathā / ahaṃ drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ pramodadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.066.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī / ayaṃ cātra mayā dṛṣṭaḥ paradāraparigrahaḥ // 5.009.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya prādurabhūc cintāpunar anyā manasvinaḥ / niścitaikāntacittasya kāryaniścayadarśinī // 5.009.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ / na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate // 5.009.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate / śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam // 5.009.039	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum / striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe // 5.009.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate / na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum // 5.009.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā / rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī // 5.009.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)
devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca vīryavān / avekṣamāṇo hanumān naivāpaśyata jānakīm // 5.009.043	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ / apakramya tadā vīraḥ pradhyātum upacakrame // 5.009.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tasya madhye bhavanasya vānaro; latāgṛhāṃś citragṛhān niśāgṛhān / jagāma sītāṃ prati darśanotsuko; na caiva tāṃ paśyati cārudarśanām // 5.010.001	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa cintayām āsa tato mahākapiḥ; priyām apaśyan raghunandanasya tām / dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me; vicinvato darśanam eti maithilī // 5.010.002	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sā rākṣasānāṃ pravareṇa bālā; svaśīlasaṃrakṣaṇa tat parā satī / anena nūnaṃ pratiduṣṭakarmaṇā; hatā bhaved āryapathe pare sthitā // 5.010.003	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
virūparūpā vikṛtā vivarcaso; mahānanā dīrghavirūpadarśanāḥ / samīkṣya sā rākṣasarājayoṣito; bhayād vinaṣṭā janakeśvarātmajā // 5.010.004	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sītām adṛṣṭvā hy anavāpya pauruṣaṃ; vihṛtya kālaṃ saha vānaraiś ciram / na me 'sti sugrīvasamīpagā gatiḥ; sutīkṣṇadaṇḍo balavāṃś ca vānaraḥ // 5.010.005	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
dṛṣṭam antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇayoṣitaḥ / na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ // 5.010.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ / gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ // 5.010.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām / dhruvaṃ prāyam upeṣyanti kālasya vyativartane // 5.010.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ / gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ // 5.010.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham / bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ // 5.010.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ / karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ // 5.010.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam / adṛṣṭāṃś ca viceṣyāmi deśān rāvaṇapālitān // 5.010.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
āpānaśālāvicitās tathā puṣpagṛhāṇi ca / citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca // 5.010.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: na-vipulā)
niṣkuṭāntararathyāś ca vimānāni ca sarvaśaḥ / iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi vicetum upacakrame // 5.010.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhūmīgṛhāṃś caityagṛhān gṛhātigṛhakān api / utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit // 5.010.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
apāvṛṇvaṃś ca dvārāṇi kapāṭāny avaghaṭṭayan / praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api // 5.010.016.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ // 5.010.016.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
caturaṅgulamātro 'pi nāvakāśaḥ sa vidyate / rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ // 5.010.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prākarāntararathyāś ca vedikaś caityasaṃśrayāḥ / śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam // 5.010.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rākṣasyo vividhākārā virūpā vikṛtās tathā / dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā // 5.010.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rūpeṇāpratimā loke varā vidyādhara striyaḥ / dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī // 5.010.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nāgakanyā varārohāḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ / dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā // 5.010.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pramathya rākṣasendreṇa nāgakanyā balād dhṛtāḥ / dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī // 5.010.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ / viṣasāda mahābāhur hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ // 5.010.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
udyogaṃ vānarendrāṇaṃ plavanaṃ sāgarasya ca / vyarthaṃ vīkṣyānilasutaś cintāṃ punar upāgamat // 5.010.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
avatīrya vimānāc ca hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / cintām upajagāmātha śokopahatacetanaḥ // 5.010.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vimānāt tu susaṃkramya prākāraṃ hariyūthapaḥ / hanūmān vegavān āsīd yathā vidyudghanāntare // 5.011.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃparikramya hanumān rāvaṇasya niveśanān / adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ // 5.011.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam / na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām // 5.011.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
palvalāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritas tathā / nadyo 'nūpavanāntāś ca durgāś ca dharaṇīdharāḥ // 5.011.004.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm // 5.011.004.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
iha saṃpātinā sītā rāvaṇasya niveśane / ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham // 5.011.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā / upatiṣṭheta vivaśā rāvaṇaṃ duṣṭacāriṇam // 5.011.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ / bibhyato rāmabāṇānām antarā patitā bhavet // 5.011.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā hriyamāṇāyāḥ pathi siddhaniṣevite / manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram // 5.011.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇasyoruvegena bhujābhyāṃ pīḍitena ca / tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā // 5.011.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā / viveṣṭamānā patitā samudre janakātmajā // 5.011.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ / abandhur bhakṣitā sītā rāvaṇena tapasvinī // 5.011.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā rākṣasendrasya patnībhir asitekṣaṇā / aduṣṭā duṣṭabhāvābhir bhakṣitā sā bhaviṣyati // 5.011.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam / rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā // 5.011.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī / vilapya bahu vaidehī nyastadehā bhaviṣyati // 5.011.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya niveśane / nūnaṃ lālapyate mandaṃ pañjarastheva śārikā // 5.011.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
janakasya kule jātā rāmapatnī sumadhyamā / katham utpalapatrākṣī rāvaṇasya vaśaṃ vrajet // 5.011.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā / rāmasya priyabhāryasya na nivedayituṃ kṣamam // 5.011.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane / kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me // 5.011.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim / bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan // 5.011.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi sītām adṛṣṭvāhaṃ vānarendrapurīm itaḥ / gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati // 5.011.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mamedaṃ laṅghanaṃ vyarthaṃ sāgarasya bhaviṣyati / praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam // 5.011.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ / kiṣkindhāṃ samanuprāptau tau vā daśarathātmajau // 5.011.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam / na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam // 5.011.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ krūraṃ tīkṣṇam indriyatāpanam / sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati // 5.011.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
taṃ tu kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcatvagatamānasaṃ / bhṛśānurakto medhāvī na bhaviṣyati lakṣmaṇaḥ // 5.011.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
vinaṣṭau bhrātarau śrutvā bharato 'pi mariṣyati / bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati // 5.011.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ / kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ // 5.011.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kṛtajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ / rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam // 5.011.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
durmanā vyathitā dīnā nirānandā tapasvinī / pīḍitā bhartṛśokena rumā tyakṣyati jīvitam // 5.011.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vālijena tu duḥkhena pīḍitā śokakarśitā / pañcatvagamane rājñas tārāpi na bhaviṣyati // 5.011.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhartṛjena tu śokena abhibhūtā vanaukasaḥ / śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca // 5.011.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāntvenānupradānena mānena ca yaśasvinā / lālitāḥ kapirājena prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti vānarāḥ // 5.011.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ / na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā // 5.011.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sāgarānūpaje deśe bahumūlaphalodake / citāṃ kṛtvā pravekṣyāmi samiddham araṇīsutam // 5.011.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
upaviṣṭasya vā samyag liṅginaṃ sādhayiṣyataḥ / śarīraṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti vāyasāḥ śvāpadāni ca // 5.011.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ / samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm // 5.011.043	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sujātamūlā subhagā kīrtimālāyaśasvinī / prabhagnā cirarātrīyaṃ mama sītām apaśyataḥ // 5.011.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tāpaso vā bhaviṣyāmi niyato vṛkṣamūlikaḥ / netaḥ pratigamiṣyāmi tām adṛṣṭvāsitekṣaṇām // 5.011.045	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ / nādhyagacchat tadā pāraṃ śokasya kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.011.048	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

athavainaṃ samutkṣipya upary upari sāgaram / rāmāyopahariṣyāmi paśuṃ paśupater iva // 5.011.050	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm / tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ // 5.011.052	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane // 5.022.020.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam // 5.024.039	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ / mayā rāmasya rājarṣer bhāryayā paramātmanaḥ // 5.024.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ / nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati // 5.024.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me / yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī // 5.024.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā / rāmād akliṣṭacāritrāc chūrāc chatrunibarhaṇāt // 5.024.043	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau / bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau // 5.024.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā / chadmanā ghātitau śūrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 5.024.045	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā / na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati // 5.024.046	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dhanyāḥ khalu mahātmāno munayaḥ satyasaṃmatāḥ / jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye // 5.024.047	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam / tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām // 5.024.048	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sāhaṃ tyaktā priyeṇeha rāmeṇa viditātmanā / prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam // 5.024.049	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ / kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ // 5.025.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyo ghoradarśanāḥ / punaḥ paruṣam ekārtham anarthārtham athābruvan // 5.025.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hantedānīṃ tavānārye sīte pāpaviniścaye / rākṣasyo bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsam etad yathāsukham // 5.025.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā / rākṣasī trijaṭāvṛddhā śayānā vākyam abravīt // 5.025.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ātmānaṃ khādatānāryā na sītāṃ bhakṣayiṣyatha / janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca // 5.025.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ / rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca // 5.025.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktās trijaṭayā rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ / sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ // 5.025.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā / sāgareṇa parikṣiptaṃ śvetaparvatam āsthitā // 5.025.011.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhartur aṅkāt samutpatya tataḥ kamalalocanā / candrasūryau mayā dṛṣṭā pāṇibhyāṃ parimārjatī // 5.025.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ / sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ // 5.025.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām / abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate // 5.025.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

pakṣī ca śākhā nilayaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; punaḥ punaś cottamasāntvavādī / sukhāgatāṃ vācam udīrayāṇaḥ; punaḥ punaś codayatīva hṛṣṭaḥ // 5.025.038	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sā rākṣasendrasya vaco niśamya; tad rāvaṇasyāpriyam apriyārtā / sītā vitatrāsa yathā vanānte; siṃhābhipannā gajarājakanyā // 5.026.001	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sā rākṣasī madhyagatā ca bhīrur; vāgbhir bhṛśaṃ rāvaṇatarjitā ca / kāntāramadhye vijane visṛṣṭā; bāleva kanyā vilalāpa sītā // 5.026.002	indravajrā [ttjgg]

sukhād vihīnaṃ bahuduḥkhapūrṇam; idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me / vidīryate yan na sahasradhādya; vajrāhataṃ śṛṅgam ivācalasya // 5.026.004	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
naivāsti nūnaṃ mama doṣam atra; vadhyāham asyāpriyadarśanasya / bhāvaṃ na cāsyāham anupradātum; alaṃ dvijo mantram ivādvijāya // 5.026.005	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nūnaṃ mamāṅgāny acirād anāryaḥ; śastraiḥ śitaiś chetsyati rākṣasendraḥ / tasminn anāgacchati lokanāthe; garbhasthajantor iva śalyakṛntaḥ // 5.026.006	indravajrā [ttjgg]

hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre; hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā / eṣā vipadyāmy aham alpabhāgyā; mahārṇave naur iva mūḍha vātā // 5.026.008	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tarasvinau dhārayatā mṛgasya; sattvena rūpaṃ manujendraputrau / nūnaṃ viśastau mama kāraṇāt tau; siṃharṣabhau dvāv iva vaidyutena // 5.026.009	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nūnaṃ sa kālo mṛgarūpadhārī; mām alpabhāgyāṃ lulubhe tadānīm / yatrāryaputraṃ visasarja mūḍhā; rāmānujaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvakaṃ ca // 5.026.010	indravajrā [ttjgg]
hā rāma satyavrata dīrghavāho; hā pūrṇacandrapratimānavaktra / hā jīvalokasya hitaḥ priyaś ca; vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām // 5.026.011	indravajrā [ttjgg]
ananyadevatvam iyaṃ kṣamā ca; bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme / pativratātvaṃ viphalaṃ mamedaṃ; kṛtaṃ kṛtaghneṣv iva mānuṣāṇām // 5.026.012	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
mogho hi dharmaś carito mamāyaṃ; tathaikapatnītvam idaṃ nirartham / yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā; hīnā tvayā saṃgamane nirāśā // 5.026.013	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

ahaṃ tu rāma tvayi jātakāmā; ciraṃ vināśāya nibaddhabhāvā / moghaṃ caritvātha tapovrataṃ ca; tyakṣyāmi dhig jīvitam alpabhāgyā // 5.026.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sā jīvitaṃ kṣipram ahaṃ tyajeyaṃ; viṣeṇa śastreṇa śitena vāpi / viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic; chastrasya vā veśmani rākṣasasya // 5.026.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śokābhitaptā bahudhā vicintya; sītātha veṇyudgrathanaṃ gṛhītvā / udbadhya veṇyudgrathanena śīghram; ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi yamasya mūlam // 5.026.017	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

śokānimittāni tadā bahūni; dhairyārjitāni pravarāṇi loke / prādurnimittāni tadā babhūvuḥ; purāpi siddhāny upalakṣitāni // 5.026.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tathāgatāṃ tāṃ vyathitām aninditāṃ; vyapetaharṣāṃ paridīnamānasām / śubhāṃ nimittāni śubhāni bhejire; naraṃ śriyā juṣṭam ivopajīvinaḥ // 5.027.001	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

bhujaś ca cārvañcitapīnavṛttaḥ; parārdhya kālāgurucandanārhaḥ / anuttamenādhyuṣitaḥ priyeṇa; cireṇa vāmaḥ samavepatāśu // 5.027.003	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
gajendrahastapratimaś ca pīnas; tayor dvayoḥ saṃhatayoḥ sujātaḥ / praspandamānaḥ punar ūrur asyā; rāmaṃ purastāt sthitam ācacakṣe // 5.027.004	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

etair nimittair aparaiś ca subhrūḥ; saṃbodhitā prāg api sādhusiddhaiḥ / vātātapaklāntam iva pranaṣṭaṃ; varṣeṇa bījaṃ pratisaṃjaharṣa // 5.027.006	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tasyāḥ punar bimbaphalopamauṣṭhaṃ; svakṣibhrukeśāntam arālapakṣma / vaktraṃ babhāse sitaśukladaṃṣṭraṃ; rāhor mukhāc candra iva pramuktaḥ // 5.027.007	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sā vītaśokā vyapanītatandrī; śāntajvarā harṣavibuddhasattvā / aśobhatāryā vadanena śukle; śītānśunā rātrir ivoditena // 5.027.008	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

yuktaṃ tasyāprameyasya sarvasattvadayāvataḥ / samāśvāsayituṃ bhāryāṃ patidarśanakāṅkṣiṇīm // 5.028.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ; prasahya yuddhaṃ mama rākṣasaiḥ saha / tathaiva khalv ātmabalaṃ ca sāravat; samānayen māṃ ca raṇe daśānanaḥ // 5.039.008	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
idam asya nṛśaṃsasya nandanopamam uttamam / vanaṃ netramanaḥkāntaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam // 5.039.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idaṃ vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi śuṣkaṃ vanam ivānalaḥ / asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ // 5.039.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato mahat sāśvamahārathadvipaṃ; balaṃ samāneṣv api rākṣasādhipaḥ / triśūlakālāyasapaṭṭiśāyudhaṃ; tato mahad yuddham idaṃ bhaviṣyati // 5.039.011	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ahaṃ tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaiḥ; sametya rakṣobhir asaṃgavikramaḥ / nihatya tad rāvaṇacoditaṃ balaṃ; sukhaṃ gamiṣyāmi kapīśvarālayam // 5.039.012	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato mārutavat kruddho mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ / ūruvegena mahatā drumān kṣeptum athārabhat // 5.039.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam / mattadvijasamāghuṣṭaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam // 5.039.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ / cūrṇitaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca babhūvāpriyadarśanam // 5.039.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
latāgṛhaiś citragṛhaiś ca nāśitair; mahoragair vyālamṛgaiś ca nirdhutaiḥ / śilāgṛhair unmathitais tathā gṛhaiḥ; pranaṣṭarūpaṃ tad abhūn mahad vanam // 5.039.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya kṛtvārthapater mahākapir; mahad vyalīkaṃ manaso mahātmanaḥ / yuyutsur eko bahubhir mahābalaiḥ; śriyā jvalaṃs toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ // 5.039.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ / rathavegāṃś ca vīrāṇāṃ vicaran vimale 'mbare // 5.043.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm / cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān // 5.043.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ / muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat // 5.043.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ / ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi // 5.043.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca / tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam // 5.043.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ / bhagnanīḍadhvajacchatrair bhūś ca kīrṇābhavad rathaiḥ // 5.043.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān; mahābalaś caṇḍaparākramaḥ kapiḥ / yuyutsur anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasais; tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇam // 5.043.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
hatān mantrisutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā / rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛtākāraś cakāra matim uttamām // 5.044.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa virūpākṣayūpākṣau durdharaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ / praghasaṃ bhāsakarṇaṃ ca pañcasenāgranāyakān // 5.044.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃdideśa daśagrīvo vīrān nayaviśāradān / hanūmadgrahaṇe vyagrān vāyuvegasamān yudhi // 5.044.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāta senāgragāḥ sarve mahābalaparigrahāḥ / savājirathamātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti // 5.044.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam / karma cāpi samādheyaṃ deśakālavirodhitam // 5.044.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan / sarvathā tan mahad bhūtaṃ mahābalaparigraham // 5.044.006.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt // 5.044.006.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
sanāgayakṣagandharvā devāsuramaharṣayaḥ / yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ // 5.044.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ / tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām // 5.044.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nāvamanyo bhavadbhiś ca hariḥ krūraparākramaḥ / dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ // 5.044.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ / nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ // 5.044.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ / na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam // 5.044.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam / prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ // 5.044.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kāmaṃ lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥ / bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire // 5.044.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe / ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā // 5.044.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ / samutpetur mahāvegā hutāśasamatejasaḥ // 5.044.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ / śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ // 5.044.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim / raśmimantam ivodyantaṃ svatejoraśmimālinam // 5.044.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
toraṇasthaṃ mahāvegaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahābalam / mahāmatiṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahābalam // 5.044.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ / tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ // 5.044.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ / śirasty utpalapatrābhā durdhareṇa nipātitāḥ // 5.044.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ / utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan // 5.044.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ / kirañ śaraśatair naikair abhipede mahābalaḥ // 5.044.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam / vṛṣṭimantaṃ payodānte payodam iva mārutaḥ // 5.044.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ardyamānas tatas tena durdhareṇānilātmajaḥ / cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān // 5.044.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ / nipapāta mahāvego vidyudrāśir girāv iva // 5.044.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas taṃ mathitāṣṭāśvaṃ rathaṃ bhagnākṣakūvaram / vihāya nyapatad bhūmau durdharas tyaktajīvitaḥ // 5.044.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ virūpākṣayūpākṣau dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhuvi / saṃjātaroṣau durdharṣāv utpetatur ariṃdamau // 5.044.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
sa tābhyāṃ sahasotpatya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare / mudgarābhyāṃ mahābāhur vakṣasy abhihataḥ kapiḥ // 5.044.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tayor vegavator vegaṃ vinihatya mahābalaḥ / nipapāta punar bhūmau suparṇasamavikramaḥ // 5.044.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ / tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ // 5.044.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā / abhipede mahāvegaḥ prasahya praghaso harim // 5.044.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān / ekataḥ kapiśārdūlaṃ yaśasvinam avasthitau // 5.044.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
paṭṭiśena śitāgreṇa praghasaḥ pratyapothayat / bhāsakarṇaś ca śūlena rākṣasaḥ kapisattamam // 5.044.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tābhyāṃ vikṣatair gātrair asṛgdigdhatanūruhaḥ / abhavad vānaraḥ kruddho bālasūryasamaprabhaḥ // 5.044.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
samutpāṭya gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ samṛgavyālapādapam / jaghāna hanumān vīro rākṣasau kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.044.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas teṣv avasanneṣu senāpatiṣu pañcasu / balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.044.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān / sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān // 5.044.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ / hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ // 5.044.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ kapis tān dhvajinīpatīn raṇe; nihatya vīrān sabalān savāhanān / tad eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye // 5.044.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān; hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān / samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam // 5.045.001	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa tasya dṛṣṭyarpaṇasaṃpracoditaḥ; pratāpavān kāñcanacitrakārmukaḥ / samutpapātātha sadasy udīrito; dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ // 5.045.002	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato mahad bāladivākaraprabhaṃ; prataptajāmbūnadajālasaṃtatam / rathāṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān; mahāhariṃ taṃ prati nairṛtarṣabhaḥ // 5.045.003	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tapaḥsaṃgrahasaṃcayārjitaṃ; prataptajāmbūnadajālaśobhitam / patākinaṃ ratnavibhūṣitadhvajaṃ; manojavāṣṭāśvavaraiḥ suyojitam // 5.045.004	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
surāsurādhṛṣyam asaṃgacāriṇaṃ; raviprabhaṃ vyomacaraṃ samāhitam / satūṇam aṣṭāsinibaddhabandhuraṃ; yathākramāveśitaśaktitomaram // 5.045.005	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
virājamānaṃ pratipūrṇavastunā; sahemadāmnā śaśisūryavarvasā / divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitas tataḥ; sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ // 5.045.006	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ; turaṃgamataṅgamahārathasvanaiḥ / balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ; samartham āsīnam upāgamat kapim // 5.045.007	upajāti (jagatī: ajñātam [jjjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo; yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye / avasthitaṃ vismitajātasaṃbhramaḥ; samaikṣatākṣo bahumānacakṣuṣā // 5.045.008	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ; parākramaṃ cāriṣu pārhtivātmajaḥ / vicārayan khaṃ ca balaṃ mahābalo; himakṣaye sūrya ivābhivardhate // 5.045.009	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa jātamanyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramaṃ; sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati durnivāraṇam / samāhitātmā hanumantam āhave; pracodayām āsa śarais tribhiḥ śitaiḥ // 5.045.010	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapiṃ taṃ prasamīkṣya garvitaṃ; jitaśramaṃ śatruparājayor jitam / avaikṣatākṣaḥ samudīrṇamānasaḥ; sabāṇapāṇiḥ pragṛhītakārmukaḥ // 5.045.011	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa hemaniṣkāṅgadacārukuṇḍalaḥ; samāsasādāśu parākramaḥ kapim / tayor babhūvāpratimaḥ samāgamaḥ; surāsurāṇām api saṃbhramapradaḥ // 5.045.012	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rarāsa bhūmir na tatāpa bhānumān; vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla cācalaḥ / kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugaṃ; nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe // 5.045.013	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ; suvarṇapuṅkhān saviṣān ivoragān / samādhisaṃyogavimokṣatattvavic; charān atha trīn kapimūrdhny apātayat // 5.045.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ; kṣarann asṛgdigdhavivṛttalocanaḥ / navoditādityanibhaḥ śarāṃśumān; vyarājatāditya ivāṃśumālikaḥ // 5.045.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa piṅgādhipamantrisattamaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ rājavarātmajaṃ raṇe / udagracitrāyudhacitrakārmukaṃ; jaharṣa cāpūryata cāhavonmukhaḥ // 5.045.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa mandarāgrastha ivāṃśumālī; vivṛddhakopo balavīryasaṃyutaḥ / kumāram akṣaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ; dadāha netrāgnimarīcibhis tadā // 5.045.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tataḥ sa bāṇāsanaśakrakārmukaḥ; śarapravarṣo yudhi rākṣasāmbudaḥ / śarān mumocāśu harīśvarācale; balāhako vṛṣṭim ivācalottame // 5.045.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapis taṃ raṇacaṇḍavikramaṃ; vivṛddhatejobalavīryasāyakam / kumāram akṣaṃ prasamīkṣya saṃyuge; nanāda harṣād ghanatulyavikramaḥ // 5.045.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa bālabhāvād yudhi vīryadarpitaḥ; pravṛddhamanyuḥ kṣatajopamekṣaṇaḥ / samāsasādāpratimaṃ raṇe kapiṃ; gajo mahākūpam ivāvṛtaṃ tṛṇaiḥ // 5.045.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabhaṃ nipātitaiś; cakāra nādaṃ ghananādaniḥsvanaḥ / samutpapātāśu nabhaḥ sa mārutir; bhujoruvikṣepaṇa ghoradarśanaḥ // 5.045.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
samutpatantaṃ samabhidravad balī; sa rākṣasānāṃ pravaraḥ pratāpavān / rathī rathaśreṣṭhatamaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ; payodharaḥ śailam ivāśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // 5.045.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś; cacāra vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite / śarāntare mārutavad viniṣpatan; manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaḥ // 5.045.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam āttabāṇāsanam āhavonmukhaṃ; kham āstṛṇantaṃ vividhaiḥ śarottamaiḥ / avaikṣatākṣaṃ bahumānacakṣuṣā; jagāma cintāṃ ca sa mārutātmajaḥ // 5.045.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ śarair bhinnabhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ; kumāravaryeṇa mahātmanā nadan / mahābhujaḥ karmaviśeṣatattvavid; vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam // 5.045.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
abālavad bāladivākaraprabhaḥ; karoty ayaṃ karma mahan mahābalaḥ / na cāsya sarvāhavakarmaśobhinaḥ; pramāpaṇe me matir atra jāyate // 5.045.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ; samāhitaś cātisahaś ca saṃyuge / asaṃśayaṃ karmaguṇodayād ayaṃ; sanāgayakṣair munibhiś ca pūjitaḥ // 5.045.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
parākramotsāhavivṛddhamānasaḥ; samīkṣate māṃ pramukhāgataḥ sthitaḥ / parākramo hy asya manāṃsi kampayet; surāsurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ // 5.045.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
na khalv ayaṃ nābhibhaved upekṣitaḥ; parākramo hy asya raṇe vivardhate / pramāpaṇaṃ tv eva mamāsya rocate; na vardhamāno 'gnir upekṣituṃ kṣamaḥ // 5.045.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
iti pravegaṃ tu parasya tarkayan; svakarmayogaṃ ca vidhāya vīryavān / cakāra vegaṃ tu mahābalas tadā; matiṃ ca cakre 'sya vadhe mahākapiḥ // 5.045.030	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya tān aṣṭahayān mahājavān; samāhitān bhārasahān vivartane / jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite; talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ // 5.045.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas talenābhihato mahārathaḥ; sa tasya piṅgādhipamantrinirjitaḥ / sa bhagnanīḍaḥ parimuktakūbaraḥ; papāta bhūmau hatavājir ambarāt // 5.045.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taṃ parityajya mahāratho rathaṃ; sakārmukaḥ khaḍgadharaḥ kham utpatat / tapo'bhiyogād ṛṣir ugravīryavān; vihāya dehaṃ marutām ivālayam // 5.045.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapis taṃ vicarantam ambare; patatrirājānilasiddhasevite / sametya taṃ mārutavegavikramaḥ; krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayor dṛḍham // 5.045.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taṃ samāvidhya sahasraśaḥ kapir; mahoragaṃ gṛhya ivāṇḍajeśvaraḥ / mumoca vegāt pitṛtulyavikramo; mahītale saṃyati vānarottamaḥ // 5.045.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa bhagnabāhūrukaṭīśiro dharaḥ; kṣarann asṛn nirmathitāsthilocanaḥ / sa bhinnasaṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇabandhano; hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena rākṣasaḥ // 5.045.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mahākapir bhūmitale nipīḍya taṃ; cakāra rakṣo'dhipater mahad bhayam // 5.045.037	ajñātārdhasamavṛttam [jt, jr]
maharṣibhiś cakracarair mahāvrataiḥ; sametya bhūtaiś ca sayakṣapannagaiḥ / suraiś ca sendrair bhṛśajātavismayair; hate kumāre sa kapir nirīkṣitaḥ // 5.045.038	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
nihatya taṃ vajrasutopamaprabhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ kṣatajopamekṣaṇam / tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye // 5.045.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tu rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; hanūmatākṣe nihate kumāre / manaḥ samādhāya tadendrakalpaṃ; samādideśendrajitaṃ sa roṣāt // 5.046.001	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tvam astravic chastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ; surāsurāṇām api śokadātā / sureṣu sendreṣu ca dṛṣṭakarmā; pitāmahārādhanasaṃcitāstraḥ // 5.046.002	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tavāstrabalam āsādya nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ / na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ // 5.046.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhujavīryābhiguptaś ca tapasā cābhirakṣitaḥ / deśakālavibhāgajñas tvam eva matisattamaḥ // 5.046.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na te 'sty aśakyaṃ samareṣu karmaṇā; na te 'sty akāryaṃ matipūrvamantraṇe / na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai; na veda yas te 'strabalaṃ balaṃ ca te // 5.046.005	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mamānurūpaṃ tapaso balaṃ ca te; parākramaś cāstrabalaṃ ca saṃyuge / na tvāṃ samāsādya raṇāvamarde; manaḥ śramaṃ gacchati niścitārtham // 5.046.006	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [jtjgg], ajñātam [ttjgg], vaṃśastha [jtjr])

idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ; kapeḥ prabhāvaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca / tvam ātmanaś cāpi samīkṣya sāraṃ; kuruṣva vegaṃ svabalānurūpam // 5.046.009	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
balāvamardas tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe; yathā gate śāmyati śāntaśatrau / tathā samīkṣyātmabalaṃ paraṃ ca; samārabhasvāstravidāṃ variṣṭha // 5.046.010	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham / iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā // 5.046.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa pakṣi rājopamatulyavegair; vyālaiś caturbhiḥ sitatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ / rathaṃ samāyuktam asaṃgavegaṃ; samārurohendrajid indrakalpaḥ // 5.046.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne; śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu / jagāma cintāṃ mahatīṃ mahātmā; samādhisaṃyogasamāhitātmā // 5.046.032	upendravajrā [jtjgg]

taṃ samīkṣya mahāsattvaṃ sattvavān harisattamaḥ / vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam // 5.049.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ahaṃ sugrīvasaṃdeśād iha prāptas tavālayam / rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt // 5.049.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa sauṣṭhavopetam adīnavādinaḥ; kaper niśamyāpratimo 'priyaṃ vacaḥ / daśānanaḥ kopavivṛttalocanaḥ; samādiśat tasya vadhaṃ mahākapeḥ // 5.049.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]

asaṃśayaṃ śatrur ayaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; kṛtaṃ hy anenāpriyam aprameyam / na dūtavadhyāṃ pravadanti santo; dūtasya dṛṣṭā bahavo hi daṇḍāḥ // 5.050.006	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśābhighāto; mauṇḍyaṃ tathā lakṣmaṇasaṃnipātaḥ / etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān; vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto 'pi // 5.050.007	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [mtjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kathaṃ ca dharmārthavinītabuddhiḥ; parāvarapratyayaniścitārthaḥ / bhavadvidhaḥ kopavaśe hi tiṣṭhet; kopaṃ niyacchanti hi sattvavantaḥ // 5.050.008	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na dharmavāde na ca lokavṛtte; na śāstrabuddhigrahaṇeṣu vāpi / vidyeta kaś cit tava vīratulyas; tvaṃ hy uttamaḥ sarvasurāsurāṇām // 5.050.009	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam / teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ // 5.050.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

parākramotsāhamanasvināṃ ca; surāsurāṇām api durjayena / tvayā manonandana nairṛtānāṃ; yuddhāyatir nāśayituṃ na yuktā // 5.050.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ / utpapātātha vegena nanāda ca mahākapiḥ // 5.051.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān / hrasvatāṃ paramāṃ prāpto bandhanāny avaśātayat // 5.051.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa tān nihatvā raṇacaṇḍavikramaḥ; samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām / pradīptalāṅgūlakṛtārcimālī; prakāśatāditya ivāṃśumālī // 5.051.039	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ / asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ // 5.052.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

mumoca hanumān agniṃ kālānalaśikhopamam // 5.052.007	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā / kumāram aṅgadaṃ caiva so 'vandata mahākapiḥ // 5.055.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ / dṛṣṭā devīti vikrāntaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nyavedayat // 5.055.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān / aśokavanikāsaṃsthā dṛṣṭā sā janakātmajā // 5.055.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yāte tasmin daśagrīve rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ / sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // 5.056.070	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī / tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam // 5.056.071	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vṛthāgarjitaniśceṣṭā rākṣasyaḥ piśitāśanāḥ / rāvaṇāya śaśaṃsus tāḥ sītāvyavasitaṃ mahat // 5.056.072	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ / parikṣipya samantāt tāṃ nidrāvaśam upāgatāḥ // 5.056.073	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā / vilapya karuṇaṃ dīnā praśuśoca suduḥkhitā // 5.056.074	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām / cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ // 5.056.075	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ / ikṣvākukulavaṃśas tu tato mama puraskṛtaḥ // 5.056.076	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava / kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi // 5.056.078	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ / devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ // 5.056.079.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham / rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram // 5.056.082	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

evam uktā varārohā maṇipravaram uttamam / prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha // 5.056.085	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tasyai praṇamyāhaṃ rājaputryai samāhitaḥ / pradakṣiṇaṃ parikrāmam ihābhyudgatamānasaḥ // 5.056.086	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tataḥ prahastasya sutaṃ jambumālinam ādiśat // 5.056.101	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: na-vipulā)

tato 'bravīt susaṃkruddho vajradaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥ / pragṛhya parighaṃ ghoraṃ māṃsaśoṇitarūpitam // 6.008.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi / yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha // 6.011.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

bhāti rākṣasarājo 'sau pradīptair bhīmavikramaiḥ / bhūtaiḥ parivṛtas tīkṣṇair dehavadbhir ivāntakaḥ // 6.047.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; rakṣāṃsi tāny āha mahābalāni / dvāreṣu caryāgṛhagopureṣu; sunirvṛtās tiṣṭhata nirviśaṅkāḥ // 6.047.032	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān; gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam / vyadārayad vānarasāgaraughaṃ; mahājhaṣaḥ pūrmam ivārṇavaugham // 6.047.033	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; dīpteṣucāpaṃ yudhi rākṣasendram / mahat samutpāṭya mahīdharāgraṃ; dudrāva rakṣo'dhipatiṃ harīśaḥ // 6.047.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ bahuvṛkṣasānuṃ; pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya / tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; bibheda bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ // 6.047.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmin pravṛddhottamasānuvṛkṣe; śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām / mahāhikalpaṃ śaram antakābhaṃ; samādade rākṣasalokanāthaḥ // 6.047.036	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa taṃ gṛhītvānilatulyavegaṃ; savisphuliṅgajvalanaprakāśam / bāṇaṃ mahendrāśanitulyavegaṃ; cikṣepa sugrīvavadhāya ruṣṭaḥ // 6.047.037	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sāyako rāvaṇabāhumuktaḥ; śakrāśaniprakhyavapuḥ śitāgraḥ / sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegād; guheritā kraucam ivograśaktiḥ // 6.047.038	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sāyakārto viparītacetāḥ; kūjan pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta vīraḥ / taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjmaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ // 6.047.039	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tato gavākṣo gavayaḥ sudaṃṣṭras; tatharṣabho jyotimukho nalaś ca / śailān samudyamya vivṛddhakāyāḥ; pradudruvus taṃ prati rākṣasendram // 6.047.040	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
teṣāṃ prahārān sa cakāra meghān; rakṣo'dhipo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ / tān vānarendrān api bāṇajālair; bibheda jāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ // 6.047.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
te vānarendrās tridaśāribāṇair; bhinnā nipetur bhuvi bhīmarūpāḥ / tatas tu tad vānarasainyam ugraṃ; pracchādayām āsa sa bāṇajālaiḥ // 6.047.042	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
te vadhyamānāḥ patitāgryavīrā; nānadyamānā bhayaśalyaviddhāḥ / śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇasāyakārtā; jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmam // 6.047.043	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tato mahātmā sa dhanur dhanuṣmān; ādāya rāmaḥ saharā jagāma / taṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir abhyupetya; uvāca vākyaṃ paramārthayuktam // 6.047.044	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kāmam āryaḥ suparyāpto vadhāyāsya durātmanaḥ / vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho // 6.047.045	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam abravīn mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge // 6.047.046	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇo hi mahāvīryo raṇe 'dbhutaparākramaḥ / trailokyenāpi saṃkruddho duṣprasahyo na saṃśayaḥ // 6.047.047	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya / cakṣuṣā dhanuṣā yatnād rakṣātmānaṃ samāhitaḥ // 6.047.048	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca / abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam // 6.047.049	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa rāvaṇaṃ vāraṇahastabāhur; dadarśa dīptodyatabhīmacāpam / pracchādayantaṃ śaravṛṣṭijālais; tān vānarān bhinnavikīrṇadehān // 6.047.050	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam ālokya mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajā / nivārya śarajālāni pradudrāva sa rāvaṇam // 6.047.051	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam / trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt // 6.047.052	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
devadānavagandharvā yakṣāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ / avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam // 6.047.053	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ / vidhamiṣyati te dehād bhūtātmānaṃ ciroṣitam // 6.047.054	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śrutvā hanūmato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo bhīmavikramaḥ / saṃraktanayanaḥ krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.047.055	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi / tatas tvāṃ jñātivikrāntaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi vānara // 6.047.056	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāyusūnur vaco 'bravīt / prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava // 6.047.057	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam ukto mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / ājaghānānilasutaṃ talenorasi vīryavān // 6.047.058	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ / ājaghānābhisaṃkruddhas talenaivāmaradviṣam // 6.047.059	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas talenābhihato vānareṇa mahātmanā / daśagrīvaḥ samādhūto yathā bhūmicale 'calaḥ // 6.047.060	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam / ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ // 6.047.061	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
athāśvasya mahātejā rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt / sādhu vānaravīryeṇa ślāghanīyo 'si me ripuḥ // 6.047.062	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt / dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa // 6.047.063	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase / tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam // 6.047.064.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato mārutivākyena krodhas tasya tadājvalat // 6.047.064.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
saṃraktanayano yatnān muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam / pātayām āsa vegena vānarorasi vīryavān // 6.047.065.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ // 6.047.065.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam / rathenātirathaḥ śīghraṃ nīlaṃ prati samabhyagāt // 6.047.066	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pannagapratimair bhīmaiḥ paramarmātibhedibhiḥ / śarair ādīpayām āsa nīlaṃ haricamūpatim // 6.047.067	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa śaraughasamāyasto nīlaḥ kapicamūpatiḥ / kareṇaikena śailāgraṃ rakṣo'dhipataye 'sṛjat // 6.047.068	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hanūmān api tejasvī samāśvasto mahāmanāḥ / viprekṣamāṇo yuddhepsuḥ saroṣam idam abravīt // 6.047.069	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
nīlena saha saṃyuktaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram / anyena yudhyamānasya na yuktam abhidhāvanam // 6.047.070	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ / ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha // 6.047.071	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ / kālāgnir iva jajvāla krodhena paravīrahā // 6.047.072	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān / anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge // 6.047.073	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ / abhyavarṣat sughoreṇa śaravarṣeṇa pāvakim // 6.047.074	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
abhivṛṣṭaḥ śaraugheṇa megheneva mahācalaḥ / hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha // 6.047.075	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pāvakātmajam ālokya dhvajāgre samavasthitam / jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha // 6.047.076	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim / lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ // 6.047.077	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejāḥ kapilāghavavismitaḥ / astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam // 6.047.078	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / nīlalāghavasaṃbhrāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āhave // 6.047.079	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā / saṃbhramāviṣṭahṛdayo na kiṃ cit pratyapadyata // 6.047.080	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
āgneyenātha saṃyuktaṃ gṛhītvā rāvaṇaḥ śaram / dhvajaśīrṣasthitaṃ nīlam udaikṣata niśācaraḥ // 6.047.081	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato 'bravīn mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / kape lāghavayukto 'si māyayā parayānayā // 6.047.082	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara / tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ // 6.047.083	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tathāpi tvāṃ mayā muktaḥ sāyako 'straprayojitaḥ / jīvitaṃ parirakṣantaṃ jīvitād bhraṃśayiṣyati // 6.047.084	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktvā mahābāhū rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / saṃdhāya bāṇam astreṇa camūpatim atāḍayat // 6.047.085	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
so 'strayuktena bāṇena nīlo vakṣasi tāḍitaḥ / nirdahyamānaḥ sahasā nipapāta mahītale // 6.047.086	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
pitṛmāhātmya saṃyogād ātmanaś cāpi tejasā / jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata // 6.047.087	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
visaṃjñaṃ vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo raṇotsukaḥ / rathenāmbudanādena saumitrim abhidudruve // 6.047.088	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam āha saumitrir adīnasattvo; visphārayantaṃ dhanur aprameyam / anvehi mām eva niśācarendra; na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi // 6.047.089	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg], ajñātam [jtjB])
sa tasya vākyaṃ paripūrṇaghoṣaṃ; jyāśabdam ugraṃ ca niśamya rājā / āsādya saumitrim avasthitaṃ taṃ; kopānvitaṃ vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ // 6.047.090	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
diṣṭyāsi me rāghava dṛṣṭimārgaṃ; prāpto 'ntagāmī viparītabuddhiḥ / asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyudeśaṃ; saṃsādyamāno mama bāṇajālaiḥ // 6.047.091	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tam āha saumitrir avismayāno; garjantam udvṛttasitāgradaṃṣṭram / rājan na garjanti mahāprabhāvā; vikatthase pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭha // 6.047.092	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
jānāmi vīryaṃ tava rākṣasendra; balaṃ pratāpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca / avasthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; āgaccha kiṃ moghavikatthanena // 6.047.093	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja; rakṣo'dhipaḥ saptaśarān supuṅkhān / tāṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhaiś; ciccheda bāṇair niśitāgradhāraiḥ // 6.047.094	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān; nikṛttabhogān iva pannagendrān / laṅkeśvaraḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; sasarja cānyān niśitān pṛṣatkān // 6.047.095	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa bāṇavarṣaṃ tu vavarṣa tīvraṃ; rāmānujaḥ kārmukasaṃprayuktam / kṣurārdhacandrottamakarṇibhallaiḥ; śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca // 6.047.096	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa lakṣmaṇaś cāśu śarāñ śitāgrān; mahendravajrāśanitulyavegān / saṃdhāya cāpe jvalanaprakāśān; sasarja rakṣo'dhipater vadhāya // 6.047.097	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasendraś; chittvā ca tāṃl lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna / śareṇa kālāgnisamaprabheṇa; svayambhudattena lalāṭadeśe // 6.047.098	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasāyakārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ śithilaṃ pragṛhya / punaś ca saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya kṛcchrāc; ciccheda cāpaṃ tridaśendraśatroḥ // 6.047.099	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nikṛttacāpaṃ tribhir ājaghāna; bāṇais tadā dāśarathiḥ śitāgraiḥ / sa sāyakārto vicacāla rājā; kṛcchrāc ca saṃjñāṃ punar āsasāda // 6.047.100	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kṛttacāpaḥ śaratāḍitaś ca; svedārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ / jagrāha śaktiṃ samudagraśaktiḥ; svayambhudattāṃ yudhi devaśatruḥ // 6.047.101	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tāṃ vidhūmānalasaṃnikāśāṃ; vitrāsanīṃ vānaravāhinīnām / cikṣepa śaktiṃ tarasā jvalantīṃ; saumitraye rākṣasarāṣṭranāthaḥ // 6.047.102	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tām āpatantīṃ bharatānujo 'strair; jaghāna bāṇaiś ca hutāgnikalpaiḥ / tathāpi sā tasya viveśa śaktir; bhujāntaraṃ dāśarather viśālam // 6.047.103	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare / viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat // 6.047.104	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
tato dānavadarpaghnaṃ saumitriṃ devakaṇṭakaḥ / taṃ pīḍayitvā bāhubhyām aprabhur laṅghane 'bhavat // 6.047.105	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ / śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ // 6.047.106	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam / visaṃjñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo vismito 'bhavat // 6.047.107	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
atha vāyusutaḥ kruddho rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat / ājaghānorasi kruddho vajrakalpena muṣṭinā // 6.047.108	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tena muṣṭiprahāreṇa rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca // 6.047.109	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

deśakālavihīnāni karmāṇi viparītavat / kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣy aprayateṣv iva // 6.051.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati / sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi // 6.051.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati / budhyate sacivān buddhyā suhṛdaś cānupaśyati // 6.051.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate / bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ // 6.051.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate / rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam // 6.051.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam / yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau // 6.051.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha / niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt // 6.051.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hitānubandham ālokya kāryākāryam ihātmanaḥ / rājā sahārthatattvajñaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha jīvati // 6.051.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anabhijñāya śāstrārthān puruṣāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ / prāgalbhyād vaktum icchanti mantreṣv abhyantarīkṛtāḥ // 6.051.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ / arthaśāstrānabhijñānāṃ vipulāṃ śriyam icchatām // 6.051.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ / avekṣya mantrabāhyās te kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ // 6.051.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vināśayanto bhartāraṃ sahitāḥ śatrubhir budhaiḥ / viparītāni kṛtyāni kārayantīha mantriṇaḥ // 6.051.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tān bhartā mitrasaṃkāśān amitrān mantranirṇaye / vyavahāreṇa jānīyāt sacivān upasaṃhitān // 6.051.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati / avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate // 6.051.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam / bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha // 6.051.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati / kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām // 6.051.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vibhramāc cittamohād vā balavīryāśrayeṇa vā / nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ // 6.051.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām / mamāpanayajaṃ doṣaṃ vikrameṇa samīkuru // 6.051.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi / yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam // 6.051.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa suhṛdyo vipannārthaṃ dīnam abhyavapadyate / sa bandhur yo 'panīteṣu sāhāyyāyopakalpate // 6.051.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam / ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha // 6.051.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava / bandhubhāvād abhihitaṃ bhrātṛsnehāc ca pārthiva // 6.051.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā / śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe // 6.051.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adya paśya mahābāho mayā samaramūrdhani / hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīṃ harivāhinīm // 6.051.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati / so 'haṃ śatruvināśāya tava niryātum udyataḥ // 6.051.044	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge / rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam // 6.051.045.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
