vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukhāvahaṃ; sukhaṃ samāhartum ahaṃ vrajāmi / nihatya rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; khādāmi sarvān hariyūthamukhyān // 6.051.046	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [jtjgl], ajñātam [ttjgg], vaṃśastha [jtjr])
ramasva kāmaṃ piba cāgryavāruṇīṃ; kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatāṃ jvaraḥ / mayādya rāme gamite yamakṣayaṃ; cirāya sītā vaśagā bhaviṣyati // 6.051.047	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad uktam atikāyasya balino bāhuśālinaḥ / kumbhakarṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvovāca mahodaraḥ // 6.052.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
kumbhakarṇakule jāto dhṛṣṭaḥ prākṛtadarśanaḥ / avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum // 6.052.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau / tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi // 6.052.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit / ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha // 6.052.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tato 'smin bahulībhūte kaulīne sarvato gate / praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya // 6.052.030.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

etat sunītaṃ mama darśanena; rāmaṃ hi dṛṣṭvaiva bhaved anarthaḥ / ihaiva te setsyati motsuko bhūr; mahān ayuddhena sukhasya lābhaḥ // 6.052.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anaṣṭasainyo hy anavāptasaṃśayo; ripūn ayuddhena jayañ janādhipa / yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate; śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute // 6.052.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram / abravīd rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ // 6.053.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

yuddhe kāpuruṣair nityaṃ bhavadbhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ / rājānam anugacchadbhiḥ kṛtyam etad vināśitam // 6.053.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam / rājānam imam āsādya suhṛccihnam amitrakam // 6.053.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ādade niśitaṃ śūlaṃ vegāc chatrunibarhaṇaḥ / sarvakālāyasaṃ dīptaṃ taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇam // 6.053.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
indrāśanisamaṃ bhīmaṃ vajrapratimagauravam / devadānavagandharvayakṣakiṃnarasūdanam // 6.053.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
raktamālya mahādāma svataś codgatapāvakam / ādāya niśitaṃ śūlaṃ śatruśoṇitarañjitam // 6.053.014.1	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

kumbhakarṇabhujābhyāṃ tu pīḍito vānararṣabhaḥ / nipapātarṣabho bhīmaḥ pramukhāgataśoṇitaḥ // 6.055.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

dattapraharavyathitā mumuhuḥ śoṇitokṣitāḥ / nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ // 6.055.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)
teṣu vānaramukhyeṣu patiteṣu mahātmasu / vānarāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi kumbhakarṇaṃ pradudruvuḥ // 6.055.023	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ / samāruhya samutpatya dadaṃśuś ca mahābalāḥ // 6.055.024	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā / kumbhakarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ te jaghnuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 6.055.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa vānarasahasrais tair ācitaḥ parvatopamaḥ / rarāja rākṣasavyāghro girir ātmaruhair iva // 6.055.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ / bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva // 6.055.027	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prakṣiptāḥ kumbhakarṇena vaktre pātālasaṃnibhe / nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ // 6.055.028	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
bhakṣayan bhṛśasaṃkruddho harīn parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / babhañja vānarān sarvān saṃkruddho rākṣasottamaḥ // 6.055.029	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkledāṃ bhūmiṃ kurvan sa rākṣasaḥ / cacāra harisainyeṣu kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ // 6.055.030	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vajrahasto yathā śakraḥ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ / śūlahasto babhau tasmin kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // 6.055.031	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ / tathā vānarasainyāni kumbhakarṇo vinirdahat // 6.055.032	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ / vānarā bhayasaṃvignā vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam // 6.055.033	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
anekaśo vadhyamānāḥ kumbhakarṇena vānarāḥ / rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vyathitāḥ khinnacetasaḥ // 6.055.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: ra-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam / utpapāta tadā vīraḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ // 6.055.035	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
sa parvatāgram utkṣipya samāvidhya mahākapiḥ / abhidudrāva vegena kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.055.036	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṃgamam / tasthau vivṛtasarvāṅgo vānarendrasya saṃmukhaḥ // 6.055.037	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
kapiśoṇitadigdhāṅgaṃ bhakṣayantaṃ mahākapīn / kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt // 6.055.038	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram / bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ // 6.055.039	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi / sahasvaikaṃ nipātaṃ me parvatasyāsya rākṣasa // 6.055.040	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad vākyaṃ harirājasya sattvadhairyasamanvitam / śrutvā rākṣasaśārdūlaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ // 6.055.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prajāpates tu pautras tvaṃ tathaivarkṣarajaḥsutaḥ / śrutapauruṣasaṃpannas tasmād garjasi vānara // 6.055.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; vyāvidhya śailaṃ sahasā mumoca / tenājaghānorasi kumbhakarṇaṃ; śailena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena // 6.055.043	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ sahasā vikīrṇaṃ; bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle / tato viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā; rakṣogaṇāś cāpi mudā vineduḥ // 6.055.044	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [jtjr], upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śailaśṛṅgābhihataś cukopa; nanāda kopāc ca vivṛtya vaktram / vyāvidhya śūlaṃ ca taḍitprakāśaṃ; cikṣepa haryṛkṣapater vadhāya // 6.055.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tat kumbhakarṇasya bhujapraviddhaṃ; śūlaṃ śitaṃ kāñcanadāmajuṣṭam / kṣipraṃ samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ; babhañja vegena suto 'nilasya // 6.055.046	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kṛtaṃ bhārasahasrasya śūlaṃ kālāyasaṃ mahat / babhañja janaum āropya prahṛṣṭaḥ plavagarṣabhaḥ // 6.055.047	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: asamīcīna)
sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ; cukopa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā / utpāṭya laṅkāmalayāt sa śṛṅgaṃ; jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena // 6.055.048	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śailaśṛṅgābhihato visaṃjñaḥ; papāta bhūmau yudhi vānarendraḥ / taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ // 6.055.049	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam abhyupetyādbhutaghoravīryaṃ; sa kumbhakarṇo yudhi vānarendram / jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya; yathānilo megham atipracaṇḍaḥ // 6.055.050	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa taṃ mahāmeghanikāśarūpam; utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ / rarāja merupratimānarūpo; merur yathātyucchritaghoraśṛṅgaḥ // 6.055.051	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ; saṃstūyamāno yudhi rākṣasendraiḥ / śṛṇvan ninādaṃ tridaśālayānāṃ; plavaṃgarājagrahavismitānām // 6.055.052	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene; harīndram indropamam indravīryaḥ / asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt; sarāghavaṃ sainyam itīndraśatruḥ // 6.055.053	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ / kumbhakarṇena sugrīvaṃ gṛhītaṃ cāpi vānaram // 6.055.054	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa matimān mārutātmajaḥ / evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet // 6.055.055	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā / bhūtvā parvatasaṃkāśo nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasaṃ // 6.055.056	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe; mahābale muṣṭiviśīrṇadehe / vimocite vānarapārthive ca; bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ // 6.055.057	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ / gṛhīto 'yaṃ yadi bhavet tridaśaiḥ sāsuroragaiḥ // 6.055.058	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ / śailaprahārābhihataḥ kumbhakarṇena saṃyuge // 6.055.059	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: bha-vipulā)
ayaṃ muhūrtāt sugrīvo labdhasaṃjño mahāhave / ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati // 6.055.060	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
mayā tu mokṣitasyāsya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ // 6.055.061	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ / bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham // 6.055.062	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / bhūyaḥ saṃstambhayām āsa vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm // 6.055.063	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa kumbhakarṇo 'tha viveśa laṅkāṃ; sphurantam ādāya mahāhariṃ tam / vimānacaryāgṛhagopurasthaiḥ; puṣpāgryavarṣair avakīryamāṇaḥ // 6.055.064	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrād; balīyasas tasya bhujāntarasthaḥ / avekṣamāṇaḥ purarājamārgaṃ; vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā // 6.055.065	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
evaṃ gṛhītena kathaṃ nu nāma; śakyaṃ mayā saṃprati kartum adya / tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇāṃ; bhaviṣyatīṣṭaṃ ca hitaṃ ca kāryam // 6.055.066	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ karāgraiḥ sahasā sametya; rājā harīṇām amarendraśatroḥ / nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ; dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca kumbhakarṇam // 6.055.067	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kumbhakarṇau hṛtakarṇanāso; vidāritas tena vimarditaś ca / roṣābhibhūtaḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ; sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau // 6.055.068	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa bhūtale bhīmabalābhipiṣṭaḥ; surāribhis tair abhihanyamānaḥ / jagāma khaṃ vegavad abhyupetya; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma // 6.055.069	upendravajrā [jtjgg]

bubhukṣitaḥ śoṇitamāṃsagṛdhnuḥ; praviśya tad vānarasainyam ugram / cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān; ṛkṣāṃś ca mohād yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ // 6.055.072	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ / samādāyaikahastena pracikṣepa tvaran mukhe // 6.055.073	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tasmin kāle sumitrāyāḥ putraḥ parabalārdanaḥ / cakāra lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho yuddhaṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 6.055.075	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān / nicakhānādade cānyān visasarja ca lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.055.076	anuṣṭubh (ab: bha-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan / kumbhakarṇasya hṛdaye sasarja niśitāñ śarān // 6.055.078	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)

tasyorasi nimagnāś ca śarā barhiṇavāsasaḥ / hastāc cāsya paribhraṣṭā papātorvyāṃ mahāgadā // 6.055.080	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ / muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat // 6.055.081	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa bāṇair atividdhāṅgaḥ kṣatajena samukṣitaḥ / rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇān iva // 6.055.082	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ / vānarān rākṣasān ṛkṣān khādan viparidhāvati // 6.055.083	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt / kumbhakarṇavadhe yukto yogān parimṛśan bahūn // 6.055.084	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sādhv enam adhirohantu sarvato vānararṣabhāḥ / yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ // 6.055.086	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
apy ayaṃ durmatiḥ kāle gurubhāraprapīḍitaḥ / prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān // 6.055.087	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ / te samāruruhur hṛṣṭāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.055.088	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
kumbhakarṇas tu saṃkruddhaḥ samārūḍhaḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ / vyadhūnayat tān vegena duṣṭahastīva hastipān // 6.055.089	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmo ruṣṭo 'yam iti rākṣasaḥ / samutpapāta vegena dhanur uttamam ādade // 6.055.090	anuṣṭubh (ab: asamīcīna, cd: pathyā)

sa vānaragaṇais tais tu vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ / lakṣmaṇānucaro rāmaḥ saṃpratasthe mahābalaḥ // 6.055.092	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ kirīṭinam ariṃdamam / śoṇitāplutasarvāṅgaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.055.093	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

jihvayā parilihyantaṃ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam / mṛdnantaṃ vānarānīkaṃ kālāntakayamopamam // 6.055.096	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa tasya cāpanirghoṣāt kupito nairṛtarṣabhaḥ / amṛṣyamāṇas taṃ ghoṣam abhidudrāva rāghavam // 6.055.098	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: ma-vipulā)
tatas tu vātoddhatameghakalpaṃ; bhujaṃgarājottamabhogabāhum / tam āpatantaṃ dharaṇīdharābham; uvāca rāmo yudhi kumbhakarṇam // 6.055.099	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
āgaccha rakṣo'dhipamā viṣādam; avasthito 'haṃ pragṛhītacāpaḥ / avehi māṃ śakrasapatna rāmam; ayaṃ muhūrtād bhavitā vicetāḥ // 6.055.100	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāmo 'yam iti vijñāya jahāsa vikṛtasvanam / pātayann iva sarveṣāṃ hṛdayāni vanaukasām // 6.055.101	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prahasya vikṛtaṃ bhīmaṃ sa meghasvanitopamam / kumbhakarṇo mahātejā rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.055.102	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nāhaṃ virādho vijñeyo na kabandhaḥ kharo na ca / na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'ham āgataḥ // 6.055.103	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
paśya me mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat / anena nirjitā devā dānavāś ca mayā purā // 6.055.104	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vikarṇanāsa iti māṃ nāvajñātuṃ tvam arhasi / svalpāpi hi na me pīḍā karṇanāsāvināśanāt // 6.055.105	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
darśayekṣvākuśārdūla vīryaṃ gātreṣu me laghu / tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭapauruṣavikramam // 6.055.106	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; rāmaḥ supuṅkhān visasarja bāṇān / tair āhato vajrasamapravegair; na cukṣubhe na vyathate surāriḥ // 6.055.107	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yaiḥ sāyakaiḥ sālavarā nikṛttā; vālī hato vānarapuṃgavaś ca / te kumbhakarṇasya tadā śarīraṃ; vajropamā na vyathayāṃ pracakruḥ // 6.055.108	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sa vāridhārā iva sāyakāṃs tān; pibañ śarīreṇa mahendraśatruḥ / jaghāna rāmasya śarapravegaṃ; vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegam // 6.055.109	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣatajānuliptaṃ; vitrāsanaṃ devamahācamūnām / vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegaṃ; vidrāvayām āsa camūṃ harīṇām // 6.055.110	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vāyavyam ādāya tato varāstraṃ; rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya / samudgaraṃ tena jahāra bāhuṃ; sa kṛttabāhus tumulaṃ nanāda // 6.055.111	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tasya bāhur giriśṛṅgakalpaḥ; samudgaro rāghavabāṇakṛttaḥ / papāta tasmin harirājasainye; jaghāna tāṃ vānaravāhinīṃ ca // 6.055.112	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
te vānarā bhagnahatāvaśeṣāḥ; paryantam āśritya tadā viṣaṇṇāḥ / pravepitāṅgā dadṛśuḥ sughoraṃ; narendrarakṣo'dhipasaṃnipātam // 6.055.113	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kumbhakarṇo 'stranikṛttabāhur; mahān nikṛttāgra ivācalendraḥ / utpāṭayām āsa kareṇa vṛkṣaṃ; tato 'bhidudrāva raṇe narendram // 6.055.114	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ tasya bāhuṃ saha sālavṛkṣaṃ; samudyataṃ pannagabhogakalpam / aindrāstrayuktena jahāra rāmo; bāṇena jāmbūnadacitritena // 6.055.115	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kumbhakarṇasya bhujo nikṛttaḥ; papāta bhūmau girisaṃnikāśaḥ / viveṣṭamāno nijaghāna vṛkṣāñ; śailāñ śilāvānararākṣasāṃś ca // 6.055.116	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ chinnabāhuṃ samavekṣya rāmaḥ; samāpatantaṃ sahasā nadantam / dvāv ardhacandrau niśitau pragṛhya; ciccheda pādau yudhi rākṣasasya // 6.055.117	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nikṛttabāhur vinikṛttapādo; vidārya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābham / dudrāva rāmaṃ sahasābhigarjan; rāhur yathā candram ivāntarikṣe // 6.055.118	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
apūrayat tasya mukhaṃ śitāgrai; rāmaḥ śarair hemapinaddhapuṅkhaiḥ / sa pūrṇavaktro na śaśāka vaktuṃ; cukūja kṛcchreṇa mumoha cāpi // 6.055.119	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
athādade sūryamarīcikalpaṃ; sa brahmadaṇḍāntakakālakalpam / ariṣṭam aindraṃ niśitaṃ supuṅkhaṃ; rāmaḥ śaraṃ mārutatulyavegam // 6.055.120	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ vajrajāmbūnadacārupuṅkhaṃ; pradīptasūryajvalanaprakāśam / mahendravajrāśanitulyavegaṃ; rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya // 6.055.121	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sāyako rāghavabāhucodito; diśaḥ svabhāsā daśa saṃprakāśayan / vidhūmavaiśvānaradīptadarśano; jagāma śakrāśanitulyavikramaḥ // 6.055.122	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tan mahāparvatakūṭasaṃnibhaṃ; vivṛttadaṃṣṭraṃ calacārukuṇḍalam / cakarta rakṣo'dhipateḥ śiras tadā; yathaiva vṛtrasya purā puraṃdaraḥ // 6.055.123	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad rāmabāṇābhihataṃ papāta; rakṣaḥśiraḥ parvatasaṃnikāśam / babhañja caryāgṛhagopurāṇi; prākāram uccaṃ tam apātayac ca // 6.055.124	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tac cātikāyaṃ himavatprakāśaṃ; rakṣas tadā toyanidhau papāta / grāhān mahāmīnacayān bhujaṃgamān; mamarda bhūmiṃ ca tathā viveśa // 6.055.125	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [ttjr], upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmir hate brāhmaṇadevaśatrau; mahābale saṃyati kumbhakarṇe / cacāla bhūr bhūmidharāś ca sarve; harṣāc ca devās tumulaṃ praṇeduḥ // 6.055.126	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas tu devarṣimaharṣipannagāḥ; surāś ca bhūtāni suparṇaguhyakāḥ / sayakṣagandharvagaṇā nabhogatāḥ; praharṣitā rāma parākrameṇa // 6.055.127	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
praharṣam īyur bahavas tu vānarāḥ; prabuddhapadmapratimair ivānanaiḥ / apūjayan rāghavam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade // 6.055.128	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa kumbhakarṇaṃ surasainyamardanaṃ; mahatsu yuddheṣv aparājitaśramam / nananda hatvā bharatāgrajo raṇe; mahāsuraṃ vṛtram ivāmarādhipaḥ // 6.055.129	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kumbhakarṇaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / rākṣasā rākṣasendrāya rāvaṇāya nyavedayan // 6.056.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śrutvā vinihataṃ saṃkhye kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam / rāvaṇaḥ śokasaṃtapto mumoha ca papāta ca // 6.056.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pitṛvyaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā devāntakanarāntakau / triśirāś cātikāyaś ca ruruduḥ śokapīḍitāḥ // 6.056.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ śrutvā rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā / mahodaramahāpārśvau śokākrāntau babhūvatuḥ // 6.056.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛcchrāt samāsādya saṃjñāṃ rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / kumbhakarṇavadhād dīno vilalāpa sa rāvaṇaḥ // 6.056.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
hā vīra ripudarpaghna kumbhakarṇa mahābala / śatrusainyaṃ pratāpyaikaḥ kva māṃ saṃtyajya gacchasi // 6.056.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
idānīṃ khalv ahaṃ nāsmi yasya me patito bhujaḥ / dakṣiṇo yaṃ samāśritya na bibhemi surāsurān // 6.056.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
katham evaṃvidho vīro devadānavadarpahā / kālāgnipratimo hy adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ // 6.056.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yasya te vajraniṣpeṣo na kuryād vyasanaṃ sadā / sa kathaṃ rāmabāṇārtaḥ prasupto 'si mahītale // 6.056.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
ete devagaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhir gagane sthitāḥ / nihataṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ // 6.056.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
dhruvam adyaiva saṃhṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / ārokṣyantīha durgāṇi laṅkādvārāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 6.056.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rājyena nāsti me kāryaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi sītayā / kumbhakarṇavihīnasya jīvite nāsti me ratiḥ // 6.056.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yady ahaṃ bhrātṛhantāraṃ na hanmi yudhi rāghavam / nanu me maraṇaṃ śreyo na cedaṃ vyarthajīvitam // 6.056.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
adyaiva taṃ gamiṣyāmi deśaṃ yatrānujo mama / na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇaṃ jīvitum utsahe // 6.056.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
devā hi māṃ hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrvāpakāriṇam / katham indraṃ jayiṣyāmi kumbhakarṇahate tvayi // 6.056.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śubham / yad ajñānān mayā tasya na gṛhītaṃ mahātmanaḥ // 6.056.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
vibhīṣaṇavaco yāvat kumbhakarṇaprahastayoḥ / vināśo 'yaṃ samutpanno māṃ vrīḍayati dāruṇaḥ // 6.056.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāto vipāko mama śokadaḥ / yan mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirasto vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.056.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
iti bahuvidham ākulāntarātmā; kṛpaṇam atīva vilapya kumbhakarṇam / nyapatad atha daśānano bhṛśārtas; tam anujam indraripuṃ hataṃ viditvā // 6.056.019	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
evaṃ vilapamānasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / śrutvā śokābhitaptasya triśirā vākyam abravīt // 6.057.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evam eva mahāvīryo hato nas tāta madhyamaḥ / na tu satpuruṣā rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān // 6.057.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
nūnaṃ tribhuvaṇasyāpi paryāptas tvam asi prabho / sa kasmāt prākṛta iva śokasyātmānam īdṛśam // 6.057.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)
brahmadattāsti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyako dhanuḥ / sahasrakharasaṃyukto ratho meghasamasvanaḥ // 6.057.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

śrutvā triśiraso vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / punar jātam ivātmānaṃ manyate kālacoditaḥ // 6.057.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tato 'ham aham ity evaṃ garjanto nairṛtarṣabhāḥ / rāvaṇasya sutā vīrāḥ śakratulyaparākramāḥ // 6.057.010	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sarve 'strabalasaṃpannāḥ sarve vistīrṇa kīrtayaḥ / sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ // 6.057.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sarve 'straviduṣo vīrāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ / sarve pravarajijñānāḥ sarve labdhavarās tathā // 6.057.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sa tais tathā bhāskaratulyavarcasaiḥ; sutair vṛtaḥ śatrubalapramardanaiḥ / rarāja rājā maghavān yathāmarair; vṛto mahādānavadarpanāśanaiḥ // 6.057.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ / āśīrbhiś ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge // 6.057.015	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

te 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ rāvaṇaṃ ripurāvaṇam / kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva mahākāyāḥ pratasthire // 6.057.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
sarvauṣadhībhir gandhaiś ca samālabhya mahābalāḥ / nirjagmur nairṛtaśreṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍ ete yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.057.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ sudarśanaṃ nāma nīlajīmūtasaṃnibham / airāvatakule jātam āruroha mahodaraḥ // 6.057.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaṃ samudyatamahāyudham / dīptānalaraviprakhyair nairṛtaiḥ sarvato vṛtam // 6.057.041	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / samudyatamahāśailāḥ saṃpraṇedur muhur muhuḥ // 6.057.042	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tāny āyatākṣāṇy agasaṃnibhāni; pradīptavaiśvānaralocanāni / petuḥ śirāṃsīndraripor dharaṇyāṃ; jyotīṃṣi muktāni yathārkamārgāt // 6.058.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmin hate devaripau triśīrṣe; hanūmata śakraparākrameṇa / neduḥ plavaṃgāḥ pracacāla bhūmī; rakṣāṃsy atho dudruvire samantāt // 6.058.042	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [jjjgl], indravajrā [ttjgg])

ekaṃ trīn pañca sapteti sāyakān rākṣasarṣabhaḥ / ādade saṃdadhe cāpi vicakarṣotsasarja ca // 6.059.076	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tatas tān rākṣasotsṛṣṭāñ śaraughān rāvaṇānujaḥ / asaṃbhrāntaḥ praciccheda niśitair bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.059.078	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa pāvakaṃ pāvakadīptatejā; hutvā mahendrapratimaprabhāvaḥ / sacāpabāṇāsirathāśvasūtaḥ; khe 'ntardadha ātmānam acintyarūpaḥ // 6.060.028	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg], ajñātam [tysy])
sa sainyam utsṛjya sametya tūrṇaṃ; mahāraṇe vānaravāhinīṣu / adṛśyamānaḥ śarajālam ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlāmbudharo yathāmbu // 6.060.029	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
te śakrajidbāṇaviśīrṇadehā; māyāhatā visvaram unnadantaḥ / raṇe nipetur harayo 'drikalpā; yathendravajrābhihatā nagendrāḥ // 6.060.030	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

manye svayambhūr bhagavān acintyo; yasyaitad astraṃ prabhavaś ca yo 'sya / bāṇāvapātāṃs tvam ihādya dhīman; mayā sahāvyagramanāḥ sahasva // 6.060.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pracchādayaty eṣa hi rākṣasendraḥ; sarvā diśaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭijālaiḥ / etac ca sarvaṃ patitāgryavīraṃ; na bhrājate vānararājasainyam // 6.060.046	indravajrā [ttjgg]

tatas tu tāv indrajid astrajālair; babhūvatus tatra tadā viśastau / sa cāpi tau tatra viṣādayitvā; nanāda harṣād yudhi rākṣasendraḥ // 6.060.048	upendravajrā [jtjgg]

tato viṣaṇṇaṃ samavekṣya sainyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇo buddhimatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ / uvāca śākhāmṛgarājavīrān; āśvāsayann apratimair vacobhiḥ // 6.061.002	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

bhrātaraṃ paśya bharataṃ tvacchokād vratacāriṇam / abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ paurān gatvā praharṣaya // 6.108.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha / vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam // 6.108.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā // 6.108.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇarāmapālitā; mahācamūr hṛṣṭajanā yaśasvinī / śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvato; niśāpraṇīteva hi śītaraśminā // 6.108.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.109.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham / mama bhrātuḥ kuberasya rāvaṇenāhṛtaṃ balāt // 6.109.009	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān / vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam // 6.109.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ / satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām // 6.109.013	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ / sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ // 7.029.034	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

atha raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhur; vijayam avāpya niśācarādhipaḥ / bhavanam abhi tato jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ; svasutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt // 7.029.037	mālatī [njjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [nnrlg], ajñātam [nnry], ajñātam [njjr])
atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramais tair; mama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam / yad amarasamavikrama tvayā; tridaśapatis tridaśāś ca nirjitāḥ // 7.029.038	mālatī [njjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [nnrlg], ajñātam [nnry], mālatī [njjr])
tvaritam upanayasva vāsavaṃ; nagaram ito vraja sainyasaṃvṛtaḥ / aham api tava gacchato drutaṃ; saha sacivair anuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ // 7.029.039	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)

tau tu rāvaṇasaṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau / vyomāntaracarau vīrau prasthitau paścimonmukhau // 7.032.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvārasaṃgrahe / tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ // 7.093.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ / kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate // 7.093.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ / pitāmahena devena preṣito 'smi mahābala // 7.094.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tavāhaṃ pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya / māyāsaṃbhāvito vīra kālaḥ sarvasamāharaḥ // 7.094.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ / samayas te mahābāho svarlokān parirakṣitum // 7.094.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi / mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ // 7.094.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim / rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān // 7.094.008	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya / viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā // 7.095.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ / na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi // 7.095.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata // 7.095.011	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / kṣaumasūkṣmāmbaradharaṃ munibhiḥ sārdham akṣayaiḥ // 7.098.012	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: na-vipulā)

tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ / bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt // 7.098.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / ṛkṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca samāpetur anekaśaḥ // 7.098.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutās tathā / rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ // 7.098.018	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ / tavānugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahāyaśaḥ // 7.098.019	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha / yamadaṇḍam ivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ // 7.098.020	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
evaṃ teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararakṣasām / vibhīṣaṇam athovāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā girā // 7.098.021	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa / rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthaḥ svaṃ dhariṣyasi // 7.098.022	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi // 7.098.023	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāval loke harīśvara / tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya // 7.098.025	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān / mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt // 7.098.026	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ / rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasam athābravīt // 7.099.001	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
agnihotraṃ vrajatv agre sarpir jvalitapāvakam / vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhayānaṃ mahāpatham // 7.099.002	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
tato vasiṣṭhas tejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ / cakāra vidhivad dharmyaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim // 7.099.003	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
tataḥ kṣaumāmbaradharo brahma cāvartayan param / kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha // 7.099.004	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: ma-vipulā)
avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi / nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmād dīpyamāno yathāṃśumān // 7.099.005	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā / dakṣiṇe hrīr viśālākṣī vyavasāyas tathāgrataḥ // 7.099.006	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
śarā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham / anuvrajanti kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ // 7.099.007	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)

tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ / anujagmuḥ pragacchantaṃ rāghavaṃ guṇarañjitāḥ // 7.099.014	anuṣṭubh (ab: na-vipulā, cd: pathyā)

na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ / hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam // 7.099.016	anuṣṭubh (ab: ma-vipulā, cd: pathyā)
draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāṇaṃ rājño jānapado janaḥ / saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ // 7.099.017	anuṣṭubh (ab: pathyā, cd: pathyā)
